title: 【寻味】Winterlicious: A History
author: Ms.F
content: [] Ruminate Winterlicious: A History Submit my comment Loading commented ruminate [] Winterlicious: A History Original 2015-12-29Ms.FUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public number rescue 2003 season that was 12 years ago in Toronto, evil wind and heavy snow shut people out waves and the desire to eat, the whole city was shrouded in a touch of melancholy atmosphere. Like winter after New Year's respect is so quiet, no need to celebrate, only the arrival of spring in the foreseeable future to look forward to. Toronto already accustomed to this routine, every year is not to endure the cold after a while it? However, for a certain group of people, this type of depression brings more pain - restaurant owners against poor turnover frequently frown: "You do not come to eat, I eat what you want?" So in order to save the off-season, Toronto Special Events Office call 35 restaurants together launched a food festival project, the official version is called "to showcase Toronto's diverse and unique fine dining restaurants". Translates to "What? You do not eat too cold in winter? I'll give you cheap packages you coming?" This marketing tool, we now call "buy." You should also remember that in 2003, SARS has just began to subside, although far less than the Chinese Canadian epidemic seriously, but enough to cause SARS impact on its tourism. So planning Food Festival and as part of the recovery of the tourism industry in Toronto has been a greater government support. Summerlicious and Winterlicious two annual food festival so fire up, and continue to grow and develop continues to this day. (Photo courtesy of Il Fornello) 2009 in addition to the definition of the new specification originated in 2003, another important food festival history was 2009, the year. Prior to 2009, the restaurant food festival participation is based on a third party and Customer Evaluation and Review (the so-called public comment) to decide, from 2009 onwards, will participate in the Food Festival restaurant filing, and the staff of the Special Events Department the good number of rigid selection criteria in accordance with regulations. This process is somewhat similar to students applying to university, it was mentioned on the network in 2009, the restaurant selection has taken a vague invitation only, presumably still a subjective component. Nevertheless, in this year, participation winterlicious restaurant has expanded to more than 150. (Screenshot from the City of Toronto official website) praise and controversy exist undeniable, Winterlicious and Summerlicious two food festival is indeed a great success. In the food and beverage industry should be the most depressed time, the major effort will reach the restaurant but usually twice as City of Toronto wish that this project can bring economic benefits, but also make food culture in Toronto to get publicity. For the majority of the goods to eat it, licious is a great opportunity to enjoy fresh food, usually too expensive restaurants within two weeks of the offer price affordable 3 course fixed price menu, popular restaurant in the open booking first full day is also not surprising things. (The picture shows the most popular restaurants Canoe Winterlicious Chef John Horne), however the saying goes, there must be a black powder, Winterlicious and Summerlicious very successful in many ways, but this is a lot of activity in the face of controversy. Licious not able to participate in the activities of the restaurant complained that his own post was hit by so many government tax take to promote their competitors, participate in the activities of the restaurant will face double the usual operating pressure, and in order to reduce some of the costs have to weight and quality to make certain sacrifices that many restaurant waiter said his workload doubled during licious, not even half the usual appreciation and gratitude are not. Customers also complained that some services are not in place, the food is not as good as daily, overpriced drinks and other issues. Meanwhile, Winterlicious many restaurants are relatively high-end restaurant, weekdays diners are more elegant manner, there will be some customers are not used during the winterlicious not comply with dining etiquette, more or less affect the dining experience of other customers. Criticism of Ye Hao, Ye Hao look, winterlicious 2016 in the eye closer and closer. This year's number of restaurants expanded to two hundred, of which only one is clearly divided into Chinese food restaurant for 15 years to join Paul Food Festival Luckee mind, chef Susur Lee will combine traditional Chinese and French cuisine, the pursuit of innovation and tradition coexist Cooking aesthetics. North American restaurant exists more or less westernized and more advanced southern cuisine restaurant in general to the main, Luckee no exception. Xiao Bian as Northerners do not expect to find much taste of home in this restaurant, but I hope to represent Chinese Luckee its outstanding performance in the Winterlicious. (The figure from Luckee official website) So what to eat this year? History will stop here, let's look at the highly anticipated crowd together several restaurants. (Tracy did not personally tasted the restaurant, the restaurant is based on the following google, yelp, tripadvisor and other sites score Featured out for your reference) Canoe [Canadian] that no parts winterlicious list ignores Canoe, located in the TD tower 54 layer, belonging to Oliver and Bonacini food empire. Bannock [Canadian] (The picture shows the 2014 winterlicious Bannock main meal of pork and chips) is still Oliver and Bonacini's restaurant, the price is a lot more than Canoe People belonging to lunch 18 dinner package 25 grades, the main Canadian comfort food. Rosewater [Modern] an elegant and romantic restaurant cuisine belongs to contemporary, from the view menu is a fusion of different national dishes. Insomnia [comfort food] Insomnia cuisine as comfort food (homemade food), the price is most close to the people of a file, but the score is much higher than a lot of fine dining restaurants. Brunch Lunch recipe biased in favor of style, dinner recipes is Hamburg, Shepherd's pie, fried chicken category. Michael's on Simcoe [Italian; Steakhouse] steakhouse with a little Italian style, the price is high only 45 dinner knives, but for meat animals is still a very good choice. Pukka [Indian] known as the Toronto-wide best Indian food on the menu you can see the classic butter chicken, vegetable curry and so on. Momofuku Daisho & Momofuku noodle bar [Asian] Momofuku not the traditional meal of the day, but there are some American style in Japan and South Korea mash. Daisho higher price, lower-priced noodle bar. Although they are called Noodle bar noodle bar, but made light of the comments it seems that this store is the best ramen meals outside (such as pork bun). Search & Book Give a man a fish than giving the fishing, the next small series will teach you the way to find a restaurant. of Toronto on the official website can find information about all restaurants in the City, Google search Winterlicious point into the first link on it. Enter the official website you will see the following interface. Select Sort and Share options can be carried out based on price, cuisine, address and other information filtering, on the whole less Asian Restaurant, North America and European accounting for a larger proportion: click through the link you can see the restaurant's specific profile, address, contact information, and most importantly Menu :( suggest that you later found to be interested in Google's restaurant and then evaluate what this restaurant.) the restaurant from January 14 started to accept reservations, although reservation is not required, but the best restaurant As just mentioned Canoe series are no slow hand, are not necessarily rush rush to get it, not to say no reservation friends. Predetermined words directly to the restaurant, if unable to go ahead remember to unsubscribe. Culinary events in addition to fixed price menu outside the restaurant, food festival there are a number of other activities, such as Casa Loma Castle High Tea at the Castle, the specific details, you can click to view the culinary events, Tickets from December 14 sale has already begun. If you are not eating Death Star will take pictures of people consider attending blogTO photo challenge, the winner will get some reward, just send photos instagram plus tag #blogTOLicious it oh. (Pictured summerlicious 2015 photo contest winners by @prisharms taken in Cluny restaurant) on this issue is more than the entire contents of winterlicious, I wish everyone at the upcoming 2016 Chihaohehao learn to play good ~ Contact us: If you want to to contribute, please send direct mail to be forwarded only after authors@uoftada.com If you want to reprint our original text graphic message, please leave a message to the background, to give permission. content: AlphaGo | winning or losing the meaning given to submit my comment Loading commented AlphaGo | original meaning given to winners and losers 2016-03-09 Zhe ♂ school assistant UT Helper UT Helper UT assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's convenient for the students to provide more No voting public are welcome to express their views: before the game, artificial intelligence, and often hear remarks as follows: "rewrite the history of mankind" "AI challenge last barriers of human intelligence," "different victories will affect AI the subsequent development of "stay up late to watch the battle and wait for the results of the small partners have expressed a deep and rich philosophical significance of the statement:" human pills "," human eating dates pills "" AI horrible bird "Lee stone and AlphaGo first game after the end of , circle of friends actually haunted by inexplicable terror. "Young awesome" become final "AI awesome" yet? Since AlphaGo beat Fan rejoice now that is hindsight, we look at the parties before the battle of words. Kai-fu Lee answered in the know almost: the Google approach takes advantage of big data + depth of learning, and almost did not use domain knowledge of chess, so if after going up chess again, I would not be surprised. Conference Li Shishi, said he spent less than five minutes to decide to accept the challenge of the machine. It is the reason some time ago Fan Hui defeat shocked. Google invitation, I felt for a long time to prepare. If it fails, then might affect the popularity of chess, artificial intelligence can beat our word is inevitable in our lives. Chinese national chess team coach Yu Bin said: If you win a Shishi, or Fan Hui 5-0 win it is true, then I think the human machine complete victory is not far. In fact, the answer is that it's 5-0 win Fan Hui is not true. On the chess AI Undeniably, the duel of great significance. No matter which side win, we will usher in all thinking and lively discussion on the new round of artificial intelligence. It can indeed become a landmark event, so that we seem to be something missing at the same time if obtained. At the same time, we have to consider the opposite: win or lose it really so important? AI really so terrible it? Why we must take mankind and created AI pendulum in the opposite? As if life and death is the right close thing. Explore the limits of science and technology in various fields produced a new definition. Let us introduce another hot topic: Redefining on stronger faster and higher. Compared to the game such as equipment upgrades sharkskin swimsuit, and even standard stadium, racket more lightweight, more accurate timing instruments and scientific training methods and even steroids and other drugs with a pan of these science and technology for sports penetration movement both ethereal and intangible unstoppable. We refresh the limits of human record, while constantly gives new definition limits. We say AlphaGo thirty million since Yi Bureau, and mankind is it not seek solace from their tools repeatedly in chess history to surpass themselves, again and again. Mudi board games of this is to seek the optimal solution, human Shuji AI is not a terrible thing. Science and technology so faithfully presented the results we want, and this particular use of computer technology to improve the success ratio and objective way why do they still controversial? What are we afraid of? What human fear? Every self-transcendence is the soul of tremor, we have a good surprise in the chess game artificial intelligence, it should also be extremely surprised human attitude towards artificial intelligence. Starting the tournament was undoubtedly the most exciting part of the start from the perspective of chess. We have to mention the word "bigger picture" (@ 09) for artificial intelligence, the chess game is the beginning of the time of senseless force. Compared to human intuitive grasp of the bigger picture is, AI over the details carefully will certainly contain its entirety of the control. When opening a high complexity of the algorithm, a large amount of data AlphaGo will bring no small pressure. AlphaGo catch mistakes stone Lee shaking reversal of the situation? According to the process of the game, then the board is divided into small portions, large-scale improved the accuracy of the algorithm in the disk after big advantage to win the details of the deal. There is a trick in which AlphaGo comeback, do not know if you've read the Xu Zhu break Jane Long chess game that section eighteen Dragon: home of the death stupid chess students then, let us have given the illusion of winning or losing, the results actually hit the face Pa Pa Pa . Let's go on out of science ELOELO rating system refers to a method of evaluation to measure the level of activity of various types of chess by the Hungarian-American physicist Arpad Elo created today is recognized as the authoritative chess Assessment Method. It is widely used in international chess, football, basketball and other sports. Online game League of Legends, World of Warcraft competitive battle system is also used within this classification system. (Wikipedia.kfd.me/zh-cn/ rating) Here's the algorithm interpretation, Arpad Elo said: players in each game's performance into a normal distribution; later Logistic Distribution generally considered more reasonable. In one game, the winning party is considered better performance, the loser is considered poor performance; if a tie, the two sides roughly the same performance. Appearing in formulas Ea / Eb player to a desired value of A / B, i.e., the probability of A / B of the player wins. When the game players A and B, the desired performance can be calculated according to the formula of two players. Ra / Rb is player A / B Current Ranking points. If a player's performance is better than expected, then the player's ranking should rise. On the contrary, if the performance not as good as expected, the ranking will drop. Sa Council for the players A score (1 or 0), K is a constant, the greater the value, the faster the score changes, the chess master usually take 16. Use this formula to calculate the level of the players after the game A Council points to finish. Also on the Logistic distribution is as follows: Fan Hui Chinese-born French occupation Go in terms of financial Sec. Fan Hui-year-old began to learn to go to Xi'an, the segment in 1996, Sec 1998, moved to France in 2000. On several occasions on behalf of Europe in the world chess game. October 2015, Fan was invited to rejoice with Google DeepMind developed out AlphaGo dividing the first five innings contest, AlphaGo 5: 0 victory record to beat Fan Hui, Fan Hui became the first in the nineteenth road board on, just get close to points being defeated Go software professional players. (Wikipedia.kfd.me/zh-cn/ Fan Hui) Lee Se-dol Qifeng sharp early, large-scale Gongsha good, outstanding achievements in recent years, grow older and mature technology, started to change for the all-around playing style, can attack to defend, firmness and flexibility become a generation of chess masters. Lee Se-dol powerful place lies in his chess style ethereal spirit magic, often have flash in the pan, both strong fighting force and the calculation is very accurate. He also has a high level of psychological quality, often catching up on the World Series to win reversal of victory in the circumstances behind. During 2005 and 2010 the first Chinese chess Coulee Kau who had numerous encounters, under great attention. (Wikipedia.kfd.me/zh-cn/ Lee Se-dol) on AlphaGo 2016 Nian 1 28 January "Nature" in the form of a cover paper describes Google's DeepMind has developed an artificial intelligence named AlphaGo, which has been defeated European Go championship, and in March this year with the World champion Lee Se-dol game. The program uses two depth neural network, policy network and value network, greatly reducing the need to consider the complexity of the search space, reducing the breadth of the former search, which reduces the depth of the search, like the human brain when the next go with intuition fast locking strategy thinking. Value Networks (Value Network) and Policy Networks (Policy Network), where Value Networks assessment board position, Policy Networks select chess footwork. The neural network model through a new training method, combined with the human race learned experts supervised learning, as well as himself and his own board games (Self-Play) learned reinforcement learning. About Google DeepMind Google DeepMind is a British artificial intelligence company, founded in 2010, named DeepMind Technologies, 2014, acquired by Google, renamed Google DeepMind. The company was founded by Demis Hassabis, Shane Legg and Mustafa Suleyman. The company goal is to "solve smart", they try to learn the best methods and systems neuroscience by merging the machine to build powerful learning method. They tried to formalize intelligence, and thus not only to implement it on the machine, but also to understand the human brain. The company's current focus is to study the gaming computer systems can study a wide range of game, strategy board game from Games to Go. You want to print DOUBLE -SIDE, then open the terminal, enter the directory of your files: cd Download # inside our download files download, cd command to enter the folder print your document .pdf # want to print double-sided know how much is left quota: pquota in BA2210, there are two printers, p2210a (2210 default printer) p2210b (2220 default printer) in BA3175, a printer, p3175a (3175 default printer) sometimes you 2210 found p2210a print bad, how to do it, you do not need to go to 2220 reprint. As long as the terminal command bar inside plus added -P printer name you want to print: print -P p2210b your file .pdf # 2220 Even if you can use the printer lpr filename.ps #-sided printing in 2210, and after not print pdf files, you need into ps format lpq # to view the current default printer queue room with cdf name and Job idlpq -P printername # view any printer queues lprm Job_id # use lpq View your print job id, you can lprm + id to remove the queue, Job and others can not be removed without permission. Simple Linux command bar is well known, the system lab computer using Linux, then use linux, there are some basic command bar very practical, but also allows you loaded to force in the Lab, the entire terminal with the command bar to open the file, all without a mouse to operate. (Bash) to enter a folder: cd path back to the previous folder: cd .. (there are two periods, do not lose sight of) view all files in the current folder: ls -l (-l the flag can View line of a document, and display the permissions) to create an empty folder: mkdir folder name utility VIM text editor, open your code: VIM code.c delete the file: rm file name to copy files from one place to another: copy the file path to move files from one place to another: mv file path of the current path; pwdSSH + NX Server and some people he does not like to go to lab, many people too noisy, of course, you can also use your own computer at home even on cdf lab computer. Then there are two ways 1.SSH 2.NX ServerSSH If your computer is a mac comes with teminal, can make direct use ssh. If you're on Windows, you need to download a ssh. ssh remote connection is a terminal server, you can display all the files stored in the computer lab, and then you open the same computer terminal in the lab. Took over an example of how to use: First, open the computer terminal, enter your ssh cdfcount@cdf.utoronto.ca he will be asked to enter your password CDF, the password is not displayed. After correct login, you boarded the wolf server, which is the cdf your computer files. Nx-serverNx-server is a software that simulates the cdf computer. After the download, and cdf computers, directly cdf landing, desktop and files and lab exactly the same. (However, this method is not how common) URL https://www.cdf.toronto.edu/nx/nx.phpSVN may learn CSC108 / 148 students have not come into contact with SVN, but after csc207 it, the rest of the Lesson more or less with the combination of markus and svn to homework. After a successful commit it, it will show the new revision. Svn add test.txt after successful checkout, you can add your new file in the Local to the repository, then commit it. File svn update local copy and synchronize reporsitory, provided, local files and repository file of the same name. If the file is new, is not sync, need to add. Svn delete test.txt is the repository of deleted files, after the completion of required commit. title: 【多大攻略】Summer School全方位指南
author: UT助手
content: [Much] Summer School Raiders comprehensive guide to submit my comment Loading commented [much] Summer School Raiders comprehensive guide 2016-03-24FAQ-Joyce ZhouUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students convenient public No. summer coming soon, and the University of Toronto campus St.George Art & Science and Architecture of summer school registration will begin April 5, Engineering of summer school registration will begin April 11. About all the summer school, small partners are not clear on all of it? Important Dates ArtSci / Architecture March 29, enrolment start time appears on the ROSI. enrolment start time when everyone is April 5th time may begin to enroll their courses. The start time is the total number of credits each student to be completed in June this year to decide, in general, the more credits start time more front. April 5, to ROSI elective. To their start time, please enjoy to ROSI election (qiang) Division (ke) it - but please note that if a lesson enrollment indicator inside P, then this class time in April 5th only on opening up priority groups of students. April 12 6:00 am, Toronto time, P is canceled. After a enrolment control of P to be canceled. No priority students choose these courses can also be friends, be sure not to sleep late, oh! April 28, payment deadline. Payment is a step summer school registration, if the April 28 registration has not been completed, then the school reserves the right to move students out of the class selected from inside. Engineering April 11 at 6 am, beginning on ROSI Course, this time can only choose engineering courses. April 18 at 6 am, began the election art & science curriculum. Art & science courses open, engineering students can begin to select the art & science courses. April 28, the deadline for contributions. The deadline to pay the money to complete the summer school registration. Payment contribution is a step summer school registration, and later grabbed the lesson, each student ROSI will appear above the corresponding invoice, paid in full before long as the deadline (April 28) on it. All students after registration is complete, registration status on the inside ROSI 2016 summer will be from [Invited] into [Registered]. When registration status becomes [Registered] After that, it shows the student has successfully registered the 2016 summer school of the ~ payment method can refer to another article UTFAQ Raiders: University of Toronto contributions perfect Raiders on Summer school tuition algorithm: Summer school is based credit charges, according to the student's major / elective / Start year / year of different study, tuition specifically different, but generally speaking, domestic student (Permanent Resident and Canadian citizen) is approximately $ 750 / 0.5FCE (Engineering $ 1400 / 0.5FCE), international student (that is you take the study permit little friends) is about $ 3500 / 0.5FCE (Engineering $ 4000 / 0.5FCE). Summer school courses Summer school will provide some professional compulsory and some popular programs, which provide specific summer school courses also small partners please refer to the following link. Art & Science courses offered: http: //www.artsandscience.utoronto.ca/ofr/timetable/summer/Architecture courses offered: http: //www.daniels.utoronto.ca/students/undergraduate-students/academics-and- registrationEngineering courses offered: http: //www.undergrad.engineering.utoronto.ca/Office_of_the_Registrar/Academic_Calendar/Summer_2016_Course_Enrolment_and_Registration.htm in time inside this column, M = Monday; T = Tuesday; W = Wednesday; R = Thursday; F = Friday. Summer school's timetable and Fall / Winter term of substantially the same timetable, should be noted, summer school's section and usually are not the same. First, summer school two term, namely first term (May 9 - 6 March 24) and the second term (June 27 - 8 15 May). In the timetable, there is a section, this section is used to represent this class of instruction time period. 2016 Summer school a total of three section: F (first term): May 9 - June 24, exam period: June 20 - June 24 S (second term): June 27 - August 15, exam period: August 9 - August 15 Y (first and second terms): May 9 - August 15, exam period: August 9 - August 15 school in summer , there are some 0.5 points course section code is Y (for example, all classes CSC), meaning that on a four-month course, but only get 0.5 credits. During the summer school services 1, the following statutory holidays in addition to the library, all the library during the summer are open as usual. Victoria Day, May 23. Canada Day, July 1. Civic Holiday, August 1. Labour Day, September 5. In these holidays, all libraries will be closed all day. It should be noted that we are familiar with radish libraries, Robarts Library, starting May 1 there will be no extended hour, and that is during the summer, Robarts not overnight. Not only that, from May 1, all of Friday, Saturday and Sunday, Robarts only open from 8:30 am to 18:00. 2. All quarters much during the hostel summer are able to stay, these hostels open time probably in early May to about 20 August, if you decide summer to live in the dorms, it only needs to and the corresponding College / Hostel Information on it. 3, canteen during the summer, in addition to Trinity, Woodsworth and Innis not provide meal, other dormitory cafeteria will be open, students can purchase meal plan. 4, how much all stadiums during the summer gym is open all the summer school students can use for free, is not on the summer school students can also get the right to use these stadiums by paying a fee. In some holidays, sports venues will be closed: Victoria day, May 23. Canada Day, July 1. Civic Holiday, August 1. In addition to the above statutory holidays closed stadiums, stadiums summer open specific time has not yet announced. Having said so much later, the students were much summer school system should have a detailed understanding of it. title: 致即将开学的我们：这是不是你想要的生活？
author: UT助手
content: Caused by the upcoming school us: this is not the life you want? Submit my comment Loading upcoming school has caused us a message: This is not what you want out of life? 2015-08-30Cheney ZUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's more college students to facilitate the public to write this article as a number of reasons, because I wish I had someone write such an article to me. Straight to the point, in the past few years, I have actually been looking for a way of life, there is hope that a person can tell me how to live. To what good grades, participate in dragon boat team basketball team, he wanted to enter into a number of communities, many of my friends, there is a beautiful girlfriend. In appearance, like everything, you can fly with happiness. However, I know that he flies very bad, every day from the future endless stress and anxiety, there is no time and effort to accompany anyone. I can not find the reason, can not solve the problem, I think this is the life I chose. So, then she left. A way of life now tell you a story. The story is a bit long, the story is a microcosm of life, a lot of people, I hope that after listening to this story, you can let the new semester is about to come be thinking. This is a story of those who kept on the run, the protagonist called Mr.X. Mr.X since primary school onwards began to work hard, you can not lose at the starting line, so the big people are told he said. After six years of hard work, he entered the city's best junior high school, and that he was destined to get into the junior high school, he did. He was very happy, he was happy for two weeks. Because now he has to start thinking that the city's best high schools, and only those who entered the university the most Diao on the high school have a chance. So he desperately efforts in junior high school, he did not how to enjoy the process so hard, but he told himself: I went into the universities in the country's most Diao, to pay all the time will be rewarded by that time I will happy. And six years of suffering, he did, he received a heavy letters, and he did, not so big so happy. Then the next two months in summer, his carefree daze, peace of mind to travel and enjoy their results. Then he entered the university, happy two weeks. Pressure again, the university more competitive, he found that each person actually related to themselves as hard, so he must work harder, because he wants to get his dream job. Then he got in the freshman summer, when the share of internship opportunities, then the pressure appeared ... he had relaxed, and happy too, but these are easily the time after the end of the exam. But each time, as pressure reappeared, he did not understand why he was not happy, because it was all he wanted, but he has got everything he wanted before, and then he said: Yes, as long as I get the job, it will be better. So he continued efforts to continue to make their resume more handsome and more sexy, he was a member of three communities, two of which served as the Chairman, on 6 courses per semester. why? Because the survival of the fittest, no pain, no gain, if you are slacking off now after waiting regret it, his teeth, endured all the way. Finally, he got the job, he was happy silly. This is what he really wanted, he succeeded. He entered the company, everyone else is top university graduate, he could not believe the fate of such blessing himself, he felt his peak in the world. He was pleased for a week. Two weeks later, he found the school's pressure and the pressure can not be compared, he never leisurely time with friends and eat in the cafeteria, he works 80-90 hours a week, he did not enjoy. However, he told himself, would be good, he will do well, if he did come to this house the company's partner when he did not need to worry about the. He continued efforts, worked hard, he did not like his job, but said to myself: Just a little more effort, to endure a little pain, then there will truly be the ultimate reward of. Hard five years later, he did, he became a partner, the company's youngest partner. His music was crazy, direct repair of a holiday, this time he has married, bought a villa in the suburbs, luxury cars, he felt at the top of the cloud. This life lasted three months. Because he is now only a junior partner, he thought about becoming a senior partner thing? is it possible? Well, only strive to achieve, because not many people can climb the pyramid in this position, increasingly steep slope, the road more difficult. But he will succeed, he struggled, endured, not interesting, but he put up, he succeeded! No pain no gain. This time, he bought a more expensive house just for a holiday, as well as a new car, bigger, faster. Then he said, I was finally, finally able to relax. Then he began to relax, relax for two and a half months. He fell into a quagmire pressure. Because he was just a senior partner, managing director, however, only one, only one, think that position is almost impossible, but he determined he could, he has been a star of the figure, there is no reason to give up here. No fun at all, he did not spend much time with his loved ones together, almost missed his son lives in all the most important moments, with his wife's relationship drifted apart, the family rarely eat together, and because the family eat a waste of time, you can help him to become managing director thing? Great course, to accompany customers to eat it. Because there is anxiety in his mind, he climbs high enough, he had to prove himself. He said to himself: Finally a brook, so I went to become a managing director, I can get the ultimate happiness. A full seven years, in seven years the material has an absolute abundance, all the time not just a lack of time. He continued to struggle and struggle, and finally, he succeeded, the Board issued a statement, he boarded the Wall Street Journal front-page news, Xiao Ming became the managing director of this legendary company. He was extremely proud of, he is happy, he is happy for some time, then anxiety again ... One day, he walked into the office, sitting in a chair, feet resting on the table, after all, he is now the boss. He looked back to see Central Park, very beautiful, and now he is really, really stood the pinnacle of the world. Then, someone knocked on the door, knock on the door, he was startled, because the general secretary will come to him to inform him, most people could not come, after all, he is now at the pinnacle of the world. He opened the door to the people is Chairman of the Board. They were greeting each other, then Chairman said: This year's profit is incredible, doing good, impeccable. We are all proud of you, thank you for your presence. However, you should retire, you have a 72. This is the life of those who kept on the run, this is my dream life before, in the best case. Of course, this is only the general outline, but emphatically describes several special stages, not entirely so. Overall, however, it is kept on the run 'lives. Rat Racer, focus only from point A to point B, and then easily two weeks to a month, and then point B becomes the new A point, then this cycle, round and round, like a continued to climb roll mice. I had always been wrong in the past, I feel happy year struggle 11 months is to last month's kind of relief; Pinmingdiwang climb for a few years is to climb to the summit the moment list of small hills sense of accomplishment. That was my 10 years of life, there is no pain, no gain, fish and bear's paw can not have both, success and happiness as you can only choose. I only live in the future, tell yourself: Final finished the can relax, and that time everything will be it. Really is a big mistake. At the time I was Mr.X shadow, it is in a cage constantly running up mice. My best outcome is to repeat Mr.X that life. A lifetime of torment suffered stress, lack of time is a lifetime, a lifetime do not know what Pinmingdiwang climb, life just live for the future, in order to prove alive and really enjoy the moment when it is briefly from A to B above, then B has changed into a, he began a period of pressure being oppressed, being ruthless time of day, and so on, until you can no longer climbing the mountain, retired. How to do that? You mean I do not have goals no ambition? no. For a world-class university of us so we do not have the target is not equal to the ambitions of our lives. Another life and this life opposition, the pursuit of excellence is an attitude towards life. Both are wanted from point A to point B, the difference is: the former only has eyes for B, in his eyes is a straight line from A to B, B not reached before he can not stop to eat with his family, only to reach a B to qualify; the pursuit of excellence and a man who kept on the run with the point of view may be exactly the same, but it is the inherent nature of different, they have the same ambitions, may be greater, they work equally hard from the outside, they will pursue as a goal, the same way they have ups and downs in life, but they also enjoy the chase process. This is the difference between excellence and kept on the run and the most essential: they target the same desire, but they also enjoy the process. To the university, you can pay a lot of friends of the opposite sex better, after all, opposites attract, a group of Friends of the base is not to feel like that, you can also find a woman destined pots friends, learn to think when it is all fun. You still hard to learn, but you can enjoy this positive feeling, you can satisfy each of two hours 15 minutes on the strategic and repair, you can relax the body meditation for 15 minutes, or simply listening to their most like small apples for 15 minutes, or dinner with friends and simply chat. Weekly day off to put yourself, do what you want to do, yes, the examination is not over, but you need to restore, you need to invest, you to enjoy this day. Then you find that Monday, Wow, I feel the whole body is full of electricity, you really learn to High, doing the title, and then two hours later, give yourself the right to relax, give the opportunity to breathe on his own, give her a call yourself to say " I miss you, "the opportunity to help the family to give yourself a wash bowl, drag a land of opportunity. Then you continue for a High pursue their goals. Enjoy how no one qualified to teach you, these are the choices, of course, can make these choices is not easy, because the need is to change your thinking change, and most importantly, act. Is not the end, but rather the journey It's not about the destination, it's about the journey. "Live not for the battle won, live not for the end of the song, live for the along." Rat Racer regardless of how long to run , climb high, he may stand in the peak of the world, see it is their inner infinite empty, apart from the height of Language, nothing. Then he looked up, oh, can not stay, there is a higher slope to climb, and then were told: We thank you for your presence, but you have retired, you have a 72. Thank you very much have the patience to see here. Live not for the battle won, live not for the end of the song, live for the alone. We treasure our school to see. In parenthesis, if you have one of her (him), cherish it. title: Uber能留在多伦多么？哪国都有烦人的利益集团拦路
author: UT助手
content: Uber to stay in Toronto it? Which country has the annoying interests highway submit my comment Loading commented Uber to stay in Toronto it? Which country has the annoying interests highway 2015-05-19 ask it UT Helper UT Helper UT assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public numbers this weekend, to see the Na Ying Xiao Bian in concert on the road the first Uber experience their own. Driver uncle asked with interest, "Where are you from," "Quo Vadis" and other esoteric philosophical problems (strange). Impressed when it comes to returning to his feeling "my country is destoryed", originally from Afghanistan's neighbors to flee to this. In short, uber in the eyes of small series is still very convenient, but "first experience" did not have time to fill before the promo code free 20 little depressed. We also want to try uber, you can fill in small series of promo code "od0uw" I have let you get a chance to reduce 20 ~ "Students, you have heard of Amway Why?" Since the $ 40 billion valuation announcement , Uber has been in a variety of ways to attract attention; however, the present, in various parts of China, India, Europe, the United States and Canada, Uber are constantly and local governments pull (si) Paper (bi); while in Toronto , this story may soon wrangling will usher in a key node. In fact, since Uber stationed in Toronto since 2012, City Council on conducted numerous meetings, debates and so on. 2014 February, CityCouncil passed a motion one for the current taxi license system overhaul, but by and large outcry guild taxi company, and in January 2015, the Ontario Superior Court was dismissed. PS In short, support and promote Uber license reform are the same people; to be hurt Uber and the reform also hurt the same people. During this period, the city government in mid-November 2014 to the High Court for a ban on Uber, first Court Hearing postponed to June 1, 2015 were a period of three days. May 4, Uber's UberTaxi announced that it would apply for taxi licenses. (But not on Uber's UberSUV and UberBlack limo license application, and UberX and UberXL no existing category can apply for a license.) May 5 CityCouncil passed a motion: all decisions concerning the restructuring of the taxi industry, will It will be postponed to the first hearing before the court to make. May 6, Mr Karygiannis put forward a new motion: to prohibit any use UberX government employment services, and forces the Uber of APP unloaded from the government issued to employees of the phone. On the same day, Uber held a protest march in front of City Hall Nathan Phillips Square. In fact, around saying Uber parties it is very interesting. (Uber, government, taxi companies for the time being the focus of our attention.) The next step on how to do this are the "Office", "talk about" two factions. Office, referring to support a permanent ban Uber service, to do him out. This party by the actual benefits, belong to the linkage drama very traditional industry has traditionally -lobby- between politicians. Talk, it is the parties to negotiate for the current dispute to find a good way out. Supporters of the party except Uber also mayor (or citizens); but only to talk about a word, look and "drag" and some are too ambiguous. As for the talk in the end whether to do it, in the eyes of many, it can not depend on the final implementation of the above regulations - to develop new norms. ---- Do ---- Uber's rise, of course, hurt the interests of the traditional taxi industry. And they (on the table) attack Uber main reason is that the Uber driver safety insurance and qualifications has a serious security risk. Government support among parliamentarians and their institutions (or that they support Members more properly?) In addition to this also points Uber on the service does not match the existing laws or regulations or violation; and the beginning of March "Snow ball action "(Toronto imagination are not cold yet ...) in. Toronto police within three days punished 11 UberX drivers. After the City of Tornto injunction filed an application to the High Court, Toronto Licensing and Standards Committee (MLS) of the Executive Director indicated that, Uber's operations has long been a disregard for existing rules and regulations, passengers and the driver himself there is a huge security risk. She will describe the behavior of Uber is "flagrant disregard" **, "a jeopardize of public safety" and even "ridiculous" **. There is a similar previously mentioned Mr Karygiannis (Ward 39 Coun.). [Burst] California shooting suspect car firefight scene seized a large quantity of firearms According to several foreign media reports, San Bernardino, California (San Bernardino) large-scale local time on December 3 11:00 shootings. According to the US CBS (CBS) reported that police had confirmed the identity of the two suspects, the 28-year-old Syed Rizwan Farook (male), and 27-year-old Tashfeen Malik (women) are husband and wife relationship, the two have been married for two years and a six-month-old daughter. Currently to 14 people were killed and 21 others injured. In this female suspect in the shooting he had previously announced on Facebook allegiance to the Islamic State (ISIS) leader Baghdadi (Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi). According to the British "Daily Mail" reported on December 3, San Bernardino, California, United States (SanBernardino) shooting gunman has exposed the murderer's motive: they had worked with a Jewish colleague a heated argument on religious issues, the latter was the couple in a shooting incident in a gun shot. After the shooting incident, and Malik Farooq shootout with police, both were killed by police. [Connecticut Dige Zhou primary school fire shootings] around at 9:00 on December 14 2012, Connecticut, USA Sandy Hu Elementary School took place following the 2007 leading to 33 deaths in the Virginia Tech shootings deaths in US history the second-highest number of school shootings, the gunman in the school siege victims to be dead within a primary school, fire principals, teachers, parents of students, including six adults, and 20 aged between 5-10 years old pupils then committed suicide on campus. American legal purchase age is 18 years old rifles, pistols legal purchase age is 21 years, according to the survey, when the killer attack aged only 19 years old, did not reach the legal age holding a pistol. [Syracuse University campus shootings in the United States] and Syracuse about two months ago, local time on October 14 evening around 7:20, along with shootings on Hope Road near Syracuse University, a small series of high school students also experienced the thrill of the shootings, according to the students to speak, when he was in the library review, I suddenly heard the sound of sirens outside the window, and then whack the crowd, the students ready to take the library elevator downstairs, only to find the elevator are accompanied by armed police, and had received a message from the school official within everyone's mailbox: there are schools everywhere in the elevator at the armed Police more serious is that in this Syracuse University times shootings, there is a Campus Police was shot dead. Xiao Bian believe I said no answer and no one believe it? [University of Toronto] school was shot fire threat just two days before the official opening of the UT Most colleges, the University of Toronto received a threat of unknown killer, the killer shot on social networking sites and threatened to fire ut Sociology girls. [End of December 2014, Western Canada burst shooting caused 9 dead two dead children] from this series of shootings occurred in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. The case from the 29th local time, has been extended to 30 days. Local police chief Rod Knecht at a news conference on the 30th, and reassure the public: "It is understood that the case is completely unexpected, there is no threat to public safety, this series of events. does not look like gang wars, more like a tragedy caused by domestic violence. "insider revealed, the case suspect eventually committed suicide, before the mood was very depressed. The case across two western Canadian cities, a total of three cases of the scene. [Canadian capital shootings has caused 2 dead 1 injured a gunman were killed] October 22, 2015 morning, located in Ottawa, Canada Parliament building, a shopping center and the National War Memorial in the center of a shooting incident. Canadian police confirmed that a duty at the National War Memorial Canadian soldiers died after being shot and another injured a guard, a gunman was shot dead by police. Witnesses said a gunman opened fire first at the National War Memorial to soldier shot and then fled into the nearby Parliament building, where then more gunshots sounded. Local television footage showed the aisle shots rang out inside the parliament building, security personnel to shoot aisle a chase. Canadian police special forces to enter the parliament building to expand the search. Canadian police confirmed that one gunman was killed in the parliament building, whether they are searching for other suspects. Currently, the Canadian parliament building and surrounding areas has been blocked. Highlight [:] [encountered shootings, how should we do? ] Well, he cited so many related shootings, when we are really experiencing shootings, how should we do it? ① quickly fled the scene, ran out of the range, choose the alarm. ② In the case of too late to escape, looking for hidden places to hide, or use all the obstacles [] hide themselves. ③ When his face at close range, pre-emptive strike, hit his vital parts, such as crotch, face, temples, joints, and abdomen. ④ gunman try to obey the requirements, do not fight with them too, causing their anger. ⑤ if they are held hostage to the strange occasion, remember around iconic items, according to sound judgment and other details surrounding the specific location, look for opportunities to send a distress message to the outside world. ⑥ play dead! In the case of confirmation can not escape, lying on the floor and play dead. [Highlight ②: Shelters on selection] - 1. Shelters should be in the position of the edge of the terrorist area and should have before and after the masking effect, both sides transparent, if found near the terrorists, can escape from so. - 2. Select the density of the texture can not easily be penetrated by the masker. Such as walls, pillars, large trunk, the front car engine and tires; but the wooden doors, glass doors, trash cans, bushes, flowers, counters, the venue seats, car doors and tail, which are not able to block the bullets, though not as a masking body, but it can provide covert action, so that terrorists can not find you in the first time, provided escape for the next time; - Select the shape is easy to hide the body, such as the column; irregular objects prone to ricochet, masking subsequently easily ricochet injuries, such as rockery, ornamental stones and the like. [Highlight ③ track through the night in case people how to do? ] In addition to the shooting outside, evening classes for students who have night 9.1 class home who have particular attention (especially girls). ① If looting, remember do not be too alarmed, want to ensure their own safety, after all, health is paramount. If you want to make money the robber, then put the money to him, in order to ensure not to hurt yourself. Bearing in mind the characteristics of the offender's appearance, clothing and the like characteristics after the perpetrators to go to the police station, clear characteristics of offenders, be possible to help the police solve the case. Ruoyin weather was too late difficult to identify criminals face, then try to remember their physical characteristics (height, whether wearing glasses, accent, tone and voice, etc.), which will become an important basis for the future to help the police solve the case. ② If you encounter rioters in the streets, do not forward concept of fun, try to choose a detour to avoid accidental injury. Under ③ girls Vespers home and try to choose a companion, not to act alone, so as not to become malefactors goal. If the feeling of being unwanted strangers from tracking, you can choose to accelerate the pace softly, do not show panic, and call a friend or roommate people familiar with the phone call to maintain its status, voices as large as possible, so that criminals know that you are working with others call they did not dare to act rashly. title: ADA娘｜苹果WWDC发布了什么
author: ADA NIANG
content: ADA Mother | WWDC Apple released what to submit my comment Loading commented ADA Musume | WWDC Apple released the original 2016-06-15ADA NIANGUT what aides UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's convenient for the students to provide more public No. Let me talk about here, the article comes with a lot of pictures (saying multi-map to kill the cat), the reader master see these words when traffic has basically gone, so I do not read the words to live traffic yo. Toronto time around one o'clock yesterday, Apple held once a year, Apple's WWDC event routine at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Given iOS9 updates mediocre, old Macbook Pro refresh cycle deadline approaching, coupled with the recent major media predict publish content to wait on her face, WWDC opening ceremony became the focus of the masses of onlookers. First talk about WWDC conference. WWDC held once a year as Apple Worldwide Developers Conference, held annually in May and June. In accordance with the laws in previous years, Apple will be released at the conference for the next-generation platform for their own individual operating system, and then start up a public beta process three to four months. Meanwhile, Apple also introduces new features that its own device ecosystem at the conference, the conference is no exception. So then let ada Mother to tell you about the conference exactly what released. When the General Assembly beginning, Apple CEO Tim Cook to Orlando just two days before the terrorist attacks occurred expressed their views, and led the audience participants Mourning for the victims. Subsequently, Cook describes the growth and development of the Apple developer community since this year, but confessed to update the conference will be published watchOS, tvOS, OS X and iOS four platforms. watchOS 3 First watchOS introduce 3. Apple watch released a year and a half since the vast majority of people have not been able to get recognition. The main reasons are watchOS such as a new platform, Apple is still in the exploratory stage, many functions seem immature, such as application load time is too long, interactive way flawed, over-reliance on mobile phones as well as the early problems. Staff came first, the new system will allow common applications running in the background, reducing the loads and load time. Subsequently, the staff of the newly designed dial sets, including "Yes, you read right warm miracle general facelift Minnie dial", "see you the day before moving much further sedentary ah do not want to fat plate movement is dead, "and" the hour hand points to where I'll tell you what time it is where the dial "............ but also increased the lateral sliding switch to a different dial gestures to respond to different scenarios. It can be seen Apple's mind is very delicate (?). In addition, the new system will bring about a new handwriting input mode, supports multi-language input; a key alarm function, it is worth mentioning that in different locations for the system will automatically provide a local alarm calls, such as Hong Kong police phone becomes 999; deep breathing using the whole system to help users at the appropriate time relieve fatigue, relax. In addition, the new system for the wheelchairs to provide a new motion algorithms to track the use of different wheelchair user movement. Apple has very carefully put on a timed reminder notice from standing watch with disabilities "Time to stand" changed to "Time to roll". In recent months, Canada has just landed Apple Pay has also been upgraded to support payment within the application on your watch, (to lift a hand to buy buy buy it). tvOS Next, Apple introduced a new tvOS. The new tvOS equipped with upgraded Siri now supports more comprehensive and intelligent search. Meanwhile, Siri, users can change the channel of the completion of the operation, rather than as before each application you want to open and then find another channel. The new system also inherits a function key authorization application, rejected the application before the need to open the page to find the authorization code and then manually enter the tedious process. In addition, Apple also released a new remote control application, apple tv now includes all the features of the remote control, and also supports virtual keyboard. Apple also said, apple tv smart home will become the center of the device, with a domestic rice "is the core router smart home" remarks similar. By the way, the core of Google's smart home is a sound (???). macOS SierratvOS introduced after the staff to bring up one of the highlights - the new OS X. Prior to the Internet rumors Apple's upcoming OS X renamed macOS, the message on the diagram the little brother came to power soon after confirmed. Apple canceled before the two versions of the home computer operating system named after big cats tradition (estimated to be on the big names running out) in favor of California place names. Following Yosemite and El Capitan, the new system named Sierra. In the three-screen a cloud to implement the concept of the spirit in the end, macOS enhance the use of cloud storage that sync your desktop files to a different computer, and mobile phones can also access your desktop files. In addition, macOS also brought universal clipboard, copy something on the computer can be directly attached to the mobile internet. Continue Apple Pay. Now you can put your Apple one machine to take paid (not) on pos machine. macOS support payments in the webpage, implying Alipay Apple version. Describes the small features multi-window merge tabs like after, Siri was brought on macOS, the audience clapping, both inside and outside the store suddenly filled with merry atmosphere (not). After Win10 bring voice assistant Cortana desktop users, we are looking forward to Apple can do. According to reports, Siri is very powerful, support for contextual dialogue, the search results directly drag and drop, etc., and integrates semantic search Spotlight updated last year. The gray-haired Boy iOS10 then went on to explain iOS10. There are ten major updates: new lock screen, Siri, the intelligent keyboard, gallery, maps, music, news applications, smart home applications, telephony, messaging, little tiny work, thank you. [] The new lock screen lock screen swipe to the right to cancel the apples from the beginning of the first generation followed unlock features, replaced by tap the home button to unlock. Lock screen camera slide left and right sliding widgets, from the bottom up is still a control center. However, Apple seems to slightly change the style, from the notification to the menu have adopted the form of a card-type interaction. Apple's design have to say this has yet to be polished (ugly). [Siri] iOS10 of Siri to third-party applications open permissions, you can now call Siri help micro letter. (So ​​call Siri can help me write articles do? Ada Mother writes a running account a bit tired now.) Siri will be presented in the form of a card for the answer part of the question, support for a key part of the card is added to the Widgets menu. Some cards support more interaction, such as clicking directly watch the game live and so on. [Keyboard] Keyboard mainly joined the context of intelligent input suggestion, keyword into a key emoji. [Album] Photos app brings a new image recognition algorithm, with the location and other information can be automatically generated album, euphemistically called "Memories". Memories based on the above information generation later albums, also automatically into one video. Once innocent little girl / boy doing now automatically help you complete the album. All in all a very powerful way, the album two years ago, but Google has achieved this functionality (Google:?) [Map] maps of still only added more intelligent search recommendation. Music music, Apple redesigned a music application, summarize: posters, large pictures, the card, against humanity. ada beloved Mother "Random All" button missing. (Ada Mother:) [news] News Application Applications with a new design. (We do not discuss the application of a non-existent)] [smart home applications Last year, Apple released HomeKit API, providing developers with intelligent home device control interface. Smart home application provides the user with the equivalent of a centralized control application that provides different scenarios automatically combined electrical switches, mobile phones electrical control and other functions. Home application will provide the switch from the bottom-up menu species slippery operations center, access is very convenient. Of course, users can now directly call Siri switch scenes, to say good morning, Siri Siri will help you turn on the lights to pull the curtains coffee or something (you have to have equipment). [Garbage] telephony phone tag, iOS10 provide garbage phone tag (before Android app is not there, "the phone has been marked as 10,000 people a liar" and the like), in addition, it provides voicemail-to-text function, eliminating the need for Now the tedious steps before the user's voicemail. [News] new messaging application functionality has been significantly upgraded. Users can now send more in the form of news, such as web pages, music, videos, self-braking graph, click, handwriting, large face, transfers, scene animation (background have something to fall or something), but also reproduces before apple an interactive watch on. Sentence, "Apple redefines the micro letter." Finally, the staff released Swift on iPad. The first not excited, this is not what the IDE, but a children's educational software to the Swift, which is built in a variety of games presented in the form of courses, which teach children basic programming skills. Apple earlier claimed that the program has been involved in all aspects of life, programmed to start with children, and now this application is to give the equivalent of action. Recently developers tend to younger, Cook also mentioned in the beginning of this WWDC developer youngest was only nine years old, it is a very good sign. This allows Niangeng-nine ada Mother could not help but panic up. During the conference, the micro letter, led by drops in succession appeared several Chinese application, let the Chinese developers smile, coupled with frequent Cook's visit to China, Apple shares drops heavily in taxi and so on, we can see that Apple China market attention. Yes, after all, so many people do. These are the contents of the conference. what? The new Macbook Pro? I heard, and so it autumn conference. content: Professor of mathematics James.Arthur eligible 2015 Wolf Prize in Mathematics Professor submit my comment Loading commented Mathematics James.Arthur eligible 2015 Wolf Prize in Mathematics 2015-03-13 Ruangong Zi UT Helper UT Helper UT assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou features UTADA's Students provide more convenient public number Prof.Arthur: hope to inspire more young people to engage in mathematics! 1 QAQ believe concern over the Department of Mathematics homepage or news of children's shoes all know it! Dear Professor, Department of Mathematics, James Arthur won the 2015 Wolf Prize in Mathematics (WolfPrize in Mathematics). He is the second Canadian to receive this international award, the first work in Canada is eligible for the award of Canadians 1. The first to receive this award Robert Langlands year working in the US, quite coincidentally once supervisor1 James.Arthur study at Yale grad when ...... Accompanied by his years of research papers http://www.math.toronto.edu/arthur/ (you can read the title right?) ** Make you closer to the Wolf Prize Wolf Prize awarded by the Wolf Foundation , the Foundation was founded in Israel in 1976, the awards began in 1978; founder Dr. Ricardo Subirana y Lobo Wolf was a diplomat with a plurality of Jewish nationality, Germany, Cuba and Israel, the inventor, philanthropist 3. This large family name was the town field. Awards a total of six areas: mathematics, chemistry, physics, agriculture, medicine, and the arts. title: 【干货】SB打败MB？Microsoft Surface Book测评
author: Justin93
content: [Dry] SB defeat MB? Microsoft Surface Book Assessment submit my comment Loading commented [dry] SB defeat MB? Microsoft Surface Book evaluation original 2015-11-08Justin93UT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate the public's number is more college students October 6, 2015, Microsoft held a new conference. Compared to Apple, Microsoft's conference has always been tepid, but this is big news broke, released a variety of windows 10 devices. Which most attention is surfacebook. As a technology (si) surgery (zhai) Associations, ADA will not miss the opportunity to try a variety of black science and technology, so we bring this issue is surfacebook depth evaluation. Not much to say, first on the map! Appearance and hinge design if the surface pro like a tablet, then surfacebook appearance and 13.5-inch screen that is more close to a standard laptop. Overall, surfacebook looks quite satisfactory, but there are many bright spots, such as: due to the special extension of the hinge structure, when the notebook is closed when the sides there are still gaps. To be honest, I do not think this design how beautiful, but a later investigation, it was found that the design of Microsoft's intention: This is first of all start with the weight of surfacebook. Surfacebook total weight of 1.51 kg, wherein the plate (screen) 0.73kg, 0.78kg base, that is, the weight ratio of the screen and the base close to 1: 1, the ratio is much higher than normal notebook. Compared to conventional shaft, this particular structure can make the length of the extension of the base increases 2cm increase balance, so that the surface book can and normal notebook as a constant opening and closing angles stand on the desktop. After all keyboard base housing, in fact, the biggest difference between the surface book and surface pro is that this base, since the keyboard surface book called real keyboard (in fact, only be regarded as the surface pro type cover). Overall, surfacebook the feel of the keyboard is satisfactory, although not as good as before I used thinkpad (thinkpad keyboard feels very good indeed), but with a considerable progress compared to surface pro. In addition to feeling outside, surfacebook surface pro keyboard would also be more than one button, and that is flat eject button when you want to take down the plate when the need to press this key. Here to talk about life endurance. In light of this, when selected, we certainly are concerned about their endurance. Before discussing surfacebook of life, we take a look at its unique dual-battery design. Surfacebook put a battery on a flat where a battery placed inside the base. When in tablet mode, consumption is flat in the battery, the notebook mode, the base preferentially consumed in the battery, and then use the plate in the battery. According to the official statement, life notebook mode for 12 hours, four hours for the tablet mode, found slightly less than the official data, but, overall almost. It was noted that life in tablet mode, only four hours, why so little? Because in 13.5 inch flat plates it has been considered a great. To control the tablet weight, surfacebook only sacrifice a little plate of life, the main battery in the dock. Therefore, from the endurance it, surfacebook more suitable for it primarily when the notebook occasionally when the tablet users, rather than primarily as flat, occasionally when laptop users. Performance and then cooling performance and heat dissipation. I tested model is I5-6300U their set was, 8gb RAM, 256G SSD. Overall, and other ultra-pole of this, as part of such an arrangement is more than writing the code, play big games less configuration. I did not test this machine on the big game, but on this machine to play for half an hour of furnace slag, a bit cpu temperature test: the case of the card game itself does not appear, but the temperature is slightly higher a bit, while the fan sound began rang. So from the perspective of the game, surfacebook not too fit, but occasionally play a small game of course is no problem. Surface Pen said so much, in fact, did not address the core strengths surfacebook or surface series. Yes, that's it - I had also thought about buying macbook, but then still want to have a computer with handwritten notebook used in pdf or onenote taking notes, so the final choice of surface. Surfacebook on the surface pen with the previous generation of surface pen similar overall appearance, the main difference is that the rubber keys from the side moved to the end of the pen, to enhance the sensitivity of the pressure sensor. Overall, with the surface pen to take notes is very convenient. Of course, there are other surfacebook also some bright spots, such as with the highest support 16gb RAM, optional discrete graphics, etc., due to (mei) Room (qian) reasons, not described in detail. Overall, surfacebook although there are still some disadvantages (such as life problems tablet mode) but for everyday office for learning, be regarded as a very good product. content: Rotman sophomore accounting curriculum guide UT Raiders assistant submit my comment Loading Rotman commented UT sophomore accounting curriculum guide Raiders 2015-07-11UT assistant assistant assistant UT UT assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi Students facilitating public courses introductory part number Benpian friendship Contributions by ECO Prep team. ECO Prep Team ECO prep team was founded by a number of large Rotman CGPA 3.9+ gods. ECO Prep original articles on Guoshu million words elective guidance, learning methods introduced, and find internships and work experience. By most professional of the heuristic method, over the past five years, 2000 to help students achieve excellent results in the ECO and RSM class. All team members are in the top investment banks, consulting, internships and four other companies are now full time office. Welcome to contact ecoprep@gmail.com with you big sister school exchange long theological discussion. The very bottom of the article there are 2015-2016 ECO220 and RSM219 / 220 communication group Oh! (Disclaimer: nothing to do with the exchange group ECO prep team) First of all, congratulations to you through the Rotman freshman layoffs! Students learn accounting, after very difficult, you finally decided to join the ranks of the CPA / CA / CMA accountants. If some people continue to freshman "Do not worry, no fear, no sense of shame" attitude in the next 2 - 3 years of undergraduate accounting, the students will learn accounting suffered various "people want to go out of the classroom, outside the classroom who want to come, "torture, and within a week and can be rushed from home on the road WO watch two or more sunrise Dongsheng from the library on the way home. * This bitter life only we understand. All in all the four full-time offer is the admission letter to senior school time. Until after watching other classmates were getting acceptance letter, we discovered that the original GPA workplace clouds. Four graduates admitted value is "soft skills" rather than "hard-ability." School finance students do not lucky, you even worse. Rotman worldwide financial top ten universities is a fact, but that is the MBA rankings. Employment RotmanCommerce financial graduates is really bleak. As a finance student, those useful math, RSM300 + / 400 + specialized courses, accounting courses (CFA syllabus), as well as technical question interview there is no time to prepare? Junior year, only to find the side everyone is busy looking for intern you, do not let yourself regret. "Pit father of it! I'm so hard to keep my 4.0 are to some god horse?" As accounting, finance students, after graduation in Toronto if you want to find the corresponding job, networking event right and wrong can not go in! Those CBC and India and Pakistan are preparing mock interview at you every day and small partners to play when, case competition, and a variety of networking. We will in the original "Internship Experience Guide" on the basis of updated more from experience, do please look forward to! ECO Prep sophomore big talk of God Accounting Courses: Since 2011 RSM219 emergence arrangements accounting curriculum was completely disrupted. From the beginning sophomore, 219> 220> 221> 320> 321> 426, after a previous one is the pre-requisite. In other words, as long as any of them drop a class, it must make up with Summer time. You will find, RSM221 not be completed during the second year. In addition, seniors recommend accounting students complete ECO209 and RSM230. Financial classmates, quietly tell you, ECO Prep seniors test CFALevel I probably only reviewed when thirty or forty hours. The reason is simple CFA Level I overwrite the contents of 30% accounting RSM220 / 221 / 320,30 ~ 40% is ECO100 / 204/209/220 and RSM230 / 330,20% are professional ethics, and the rest is RSM430 / 432/433 / 435. (CFA team passed the exams and the latest CPA exam in the future we will continue to publish on CFA, CPA's introduction.) RSM219: RSM219 accounting introductory course is compulsory for all students Rotman. Zuliani has been run by a theme and design. This course really is an introductory course in accounting, though seemingly simple, especially when many Canadian-trained accountant Grade11,12 students feel easy. However, each year many learned a little accounting students are careless, then finally pit miserable. Seniors absolutely recommend this course to deal carefully, course requirements are not difficult in itself, but is required to lay the foundation for the strong RSM200 + / 300 + / 400 + courses. Elective, because the Zuliani is out of question, Professor, but the people themselves also quite nice (although there are times made a big temper), it is proposed to her class. But this course is not a lot pasttest resources. Zuliani prefer to use the original title, so she did not like the previous test leak out. This course before midterm law is very simple, to all kinds of high, hard and final burst to pressure points. Other professors, such as Edward Alex and so is not very clear. Interested students can go try. For many senior students, accounting last class RSM426 is Zuliani and Richardson taught. The first door Accounting Division and a final accounting class by a teacher, the final will be very moving. Every year, the last class of students in the class Zuliani CRY. RSM219 key is to lay the foundation for all future Accounting class, to a clear understanding of Debit / Credit and Basic Financial Statement. Generally the first semester of academic stress is not too heavy, must pass RSM219 lay a solid foundation. Special attention to this simple course Midterm, Final will be much more difficult. (However, compared to the difficulty and RSM220, or worse lot) RSM220: This door is a real accounting introductory course. Also particularly useful for students who finance. Accounting is not simply a record debit, credit that simple. RSM220 mainly on the purpose of accounting standards and how to follow the requirements of accounting standards at the right time, at the right subjects, remember the correct amount. This course is taught in the past by our dear Marshal Ge Dela root Dragan and friendly Chinese professor BaohuaXin together, but this course does not teach the main lecturer Dragan 220 last year to predict the likelihood is relatively small. However, this year we came back to teach Chinese Professor Baohua up. Baohua lectures very logical, with his good ideas, his lectures carefully understand each page of the test scores are an absolute effect. Baohua thinking more in line with Chinese students in class well organized, very clear test sites. But Dragan and difference than some creativity. But Baohua is very, very good professor, I like his seniors. Before he could be class and Chinese students also speak Chinese, but since he also found that Chinese students and more outrageous, he will no longer class and students with Chinese explanation. So I said the first time and he really Chinese, but also after the end of this course. Also next year, a professor Eszter, online information about her less. In fact, she also taught for many years at the Rotman, but in recent years did not teach RSM220. This year she will teach RSM220 / RSM222, as these programs are similar. This course must be writing assignment Oh, be regarded as a beginning, the future RSM221 / 320/322 have to write much more. About RSM220, the best way to learn is to do in addition to the title, other than reading, it is to weekly Tutorial. RSM220 the TA who will lead the students to do the Tutorial past Past Test, as well as help summarized RSM220 focus. RSM220 main difficulty is knowledge very much, but each can become a knowledge test sites, so many students overwhelmed. In fact, this course as long as a good school, listen carefully Tutorial, home reading summarize key points, not a very difficult course. Accounting and later actually is not all science, but to be treated as a liberal arts. RSM225: RSM225 on BusinessLaw and PersonalLaw. This course many students head feeling great, because you want to back a lot of knowledge. Beginning last year, this course seems to be how each prof batch volume will be slightly different. I remember when not review rote Oh, to be back keyword! Also, if a teacher can have a sort of notes, will be of great help. I intend to apply for law school students, this introductory course, but just oh. RSM222: RSM222 is compulsory for all students Rotman. This course if not Accounting students must seriously face. Because many Fixed Cost, Variable Cost issues in the interview, work is also very commonly used in the future. I have a consultation in the last interview on how to effectively reduce the cost, is entirely from a reduction of various variable cost to find the breakeven point. And in Finance in financial modeling is also taking into account the various changes in the cost. This year has been the main instructor Hai Lu do not teach RSM222, and the Donna Losell, Gus DeFranco and Eszter teach together. Donna is very personal teacher, everyone on RSM322 time encounter her again. I remember her class do not be late, do not play phone, and not to talk to the person next to speak; otherwise you will be rushed to the outside. Gus DeFranco also be evaluated in recent years. In addition this year is Eszter Protestant RSM220, RSM222 the teacher. Overall, this year compared to last year and lecture team of teachers vary widely. RSM222 itself is very simple, mainly to understand the concepts, these basic Management Accounting also later worked the longest encountered. For example, Process flow, Activity based costing; especially considering the various methods of calculation of Variance. Content RSM222 and now CPA exam Core2 very similar exams, students who want to take the CPA must work hard in this course. Similarly, this course the best way is to review the weekly tutorial, practice and review questions to the teacher. Last year, a midterm exam exercises of the original title.
