title: UT助手新生攻略之CS基础课
author: UT助手
content: UT assistant newborn Raiders CS basic course submit my comment Loading commented UT assistant newborn Raiders CS basic course 2015-07-06UT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public number PARTI lower grades first look at the course selection on the 2015-2016 calendar of CS course requirements: SPECIALIST: Firstyear (2.5 FCEs): 1. (CSC108H1, CSC148H1) / CSC150H1, CSC165H1 / CSC240H1; (MAT135H1, MAT136H1) / MAT137Y1 / MAT157Y1Secondyear (3.5 FCEs): 2. CSC207H1, CSC209H1, CSC236H1 / CSC240H1, CSC258H1, CSC263H1 / CSC265H1; MAT221H1 / MAT223H1 / MAT240H1; STA247H1 / STA255H1 / STA257H1Major: First year (2.5 FCEs): 1. (CSC108H1, CSC148H1) / CSC150H1, CSC165H1 / CSC240H1; (MAT135H1, MAT136H1) / MAT137Y1 / MAT157Y1Second year (2.5 FCEs): 2. CSC207H1, CSC236H1 / CSC240H1, CSC258H1, CSC263H1 / CSC265H1; STA247H1 / STA255H1 / STA257H1 can see, Specialist and major in freshman and sophomore the only difference CSC209 courses, so tangled in the end is a specialist in children's shoes or major freshman and sophomore does not worry too much about the differences with the course on. (To mention here, specialist and both large and several major election are to receive retroactive fee, so late into the professional want to save money this way does not work) and then look into the professional requirements: Specialist & Major: Applying using thefirst set of criteria: · An average mark of atleast 67% in CSC148H1 and CSC165H1 / CSC240H1 with a minimum mark of 60% in each course · Completion of 4.0 FCEsThose who do not meetthe first set of criteria will be considered using the second set of criteria : · Completion of CSC148H1, CSC165H1, MAT136H1 / MAT137Y1 / MAT157Y1 · CSC207H1 and CSC236H1 / CSC240H1 with an average grade of at least 70% · Completion of 4.0 FCEs Minor: Applying using thefirst set of criteria: · An average mark of atleast 75% . in CSC148H1 and CSC165H1 / CSC240H1 · Completion of 4.0 FCEsThose who do not meetthe first set of criteria will be considered using the second set of criteria: · Completion of CSC148H1, CSC165H1 / CSC240H1 · CSC207H1 and CSC236H1 / CSC240H1 with an average mark of 75 % · Completion of 4.0 FCEs Yes, yes, Minor requirements rather than major and specialist. So we decided to choose minor children's shoes must be early to prepare. Course Description: (CSC108, CSC148) / CSC150: CSC150 for several years did not open, so we will choose the 108 and 148. CSC108 CSC148 and the language used is python, CSC108 more emphasis on basic grammar and applications, CSC148 more focused on simple data structures and program logic. title: 关于「人工智能 A.I.」—— 我有故事和酒
author: 张杰西，J
content: On "AI Artificial Intelligence" - I have to submit my story and wine message Loading commented on "AI Artificial Intelligence" - I have the original story and wine 2016-03-08 Jesse Zhang, JUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro features UTADA's signal UTzhushou facilitate public No. I want to talk about a very far away from modern technology, science fiction stories and more college students. Movie "A.I: Artificial Intelligence", there is a loved programmed robot boy David. In order to save the mother who lost a child, David entered as a substitute for a family, but gradually fell out of favor, his mother abandoned by humans. Later, he was thousands of miles across, only a desire to achieve the impossible - to become a real child, returned to the side of his beloved mother. Movies so many people stuck in my throat, not only because of human selfishness and varied, and the eternal loyalty program, but also because of the story behind, as if there are many problems humanity must face: "? Are based on the material basis of emotion," "thinking you can manually copy it? "," when love and creativity become artificial, you'll enjoy still afraid of it?. " Perhaps you will say, "AI closest thing I've ever seen, nothing more than recommended commodity Taobao, Netease cloud music" Daily Song ", at most, will be able to easily molested Siri, sometimes will deviation, these are weak artificial intelligence, from the real ability to have human AI that much difference. "Do not judge! wish to go down to look at the technological frontier step. A month ago, google developed AlphaGo Go to defeat European champion, fell on the last human chess project; Then, there are almost perfect from google can adapt to the external environment of the robot Atlas. This may indicate a growing will, "calculating" in the A.I. into human life. Imagine a robot has a human appearance sitting across from you and your chess, chess can often see through your routine method, how would you feel? Follow technology news people will feel vague: artificial general intelligence has been exposed tip of the iceberg. A.I. This hot topic has provoked a lively discussion seems more than ever, the ability to limit either on ethical or on artificial intelligence. The machine can get emotional? I want to talk from the second story. I was in a bookstore reading many years ago when a science fiction novel, called "count", formerly known as "Newton's New Clothes." It talked about the future, forecasting and consulting analysis, and related occupations no longer exist. Only one called "energy" of the computer, it is a very powerful artificial intelligence that can calculate everything. But the end of the book, the male and female to win, because "can" love them can not be calculated, so that the computer can calculate the crash. Therefore, artificial intelligence, it is not the bottleneck? In the end they can not learn human feelings? However, like Helen of Troy after seeing Yang Guo suddenly understand what love is the same; as one day you see a gray-haired father felt the same guilt and sorrow and grief - the machine is difficult to obtain certain human emotions, because these emotions It looks more like a soul "awakening" not acquired. The machine can detect changes in your body Liheermeng, testing out your adrenaline sudden rise, it is difficult to take the initiative to produce complex and subtle human heart, indescribable emotion. But the machine can interpret a person from the big data: the human behavior through the full range of recording, after calculation, analysis, resulting in a seemingly emotional conclusion. Technically speaking, A.I. How about you exactly how to read? Today's artificial intelligence is divided into roughly three categories: classic AI (Classic AI), a simple neural network (Simple Neural Networks) and biological neural networks (Biological Neural Networks) among the most "smart" way is biological neural networks. (Examples of biological neural networks: Numenta manufactured Hierarchical Temporal Memory) For ease of understanding, give life example: A company would like to find hidden in the workforce of some bad employees, these employees find malicious behavior in the workplace, For example, disclosure of confidential business documents. Without employees browse mail premise, how to use A.I. know who is abusing power? "Biological neural networks" would get from there to every employee data (such as a file being viewed daily frequency number, mail number, etc.), and then automatically to each individual to establish "normal state behavior norms," ​​a model. Then the system would be predicted from what normal behavior of each employee, what is abnormal behavior Yes. All modular computing are all done automatically, without any manual intervention. Thus, for each individual independent model, then as data changes constantly self-correct adjustment (what we call learning ability), and dynamically identify malicious employees. (Source: Jeffhawkins & Donna Dubinsky) It would appear that a pre-written program, you can follow the changes in the human make the appropriate changes, and then even have creativity. However, when such re-creativity continues to progress, even to the "active thinking" in height, whether brewing tragedy? I want to say third story is a microcosm of a lot about the "A.I transgression mankind" works. Movie "I, ROBOT" ( "I, Robot") and tells the story of one day in the future, due to the hard work of scientists, robots replaced humans do all the work. There is also a very powerful artificial intelligence VIKI help people solve analyze various problems, but after a time for self-promotion, it analyzed, and worked hard to maintain law and order, compared to save in times of crisis, imprisoned, limit human, It is the best way to ensure human reproduction. It controls all the robots eventually began a controlling human revolution. Do not rush to say that this situation can not, and do not use the robot's behavior is defined as "unjust." Behind this involves intelligent philosophy (Philosophy of Artificial Science) and the Philosophy of Mind (Philosophy of Mind) issue. You can try to think about the interesting question: to what extent the machine intelligence with human intelligence was equal? Machine moral, immoral, or moral, is a human problem, or AI problems, or "we" common problem? Since the "morality" is a human-defined, they can be judged by the machine do? ... ... (From "" smart "philosophy - Man and Artificial Intelligence") based on Turing (AM Turing, 1912-1954) in the "MIND" published in "Computer and Intelligence" (Computing Machinery and Intelligence) one article, "Turing test" (Turing test TT) test was used to compare the human intelligence and artificial intelligence. But in fact, "Comparison between man and machine," not a problem, the problem is "Turing test" the test whether "right", and this is tantamount to man or machine "correct" what is .... .. Back to the science and technology fields. Technically far less people today to obscenity, "I, Robot" this story, how could let humans wanton development of artificial intelligence? Has long been wary of humans, you can always turn off the button in the future development of artificial intelligence. Think of cloning it. Since humans do not accidentally invented the nuclear bomb, humans have learned moderation. Just as we will not continue to study how to make a cloned person. We have to do is strive to develop, then the last step before the cliff to tighten the reins on the horse's neck. After the development of technology to a node might exponential growth, the impact of this explosive growth brought about by unpredictable, humans do not know where to stand curve. Distant future, perhaps at hand. There are a lot of stories about A.I. The human brain was wide open infinite: AI who fell in love with the owner or produce emotional, or independent thinking have launched an uprising, or even creativity has a strong productivity program replaces all apes, is even analyze heterosexual deserve heresy trial ...... that time humans may big fun. However, if there is artificial intelligence comparable to human beings that day, I would think that would not be related to A.I like horror movies. If a robot to understand human emotions at the same time there is full reason, it is more likely to be good like a spoiled dog flattering, but also as experts like sister tease capture your heart. As the "Cyborg She", once the AI ​​can understand human emotions, then his master becomes "love IQ is negative," the state simply will not be too easy. As you can always easily from where your parents get the support and connivance of comfort, like an undercover robot is also very easy as capturing your trust. Today, we can do most want to achieve, it is to continue to make machines smarter. But do not forget - our ultimate goal is not the development of technology, but the realization of human happiness. "Human talent is the most great rights to chase the dream." - <AI> Huobiboshi ADA Cool CS motherfucker take you to see the world's Little Helper check for you to learn life information (Wechat ID: utzhushou) Read the fine Complaints the authors selected a message that has been set to be concerned about the message before you can write a message to the author of the article is set to be concerned about the message before you can write a message loading more comments from the public after a number of filters to display details about comments feature micro-channel sweep the attention of the public number

title: 【Geoffrey Hinton】We are now the lunatic core
author: F方方
content: [Geoffrey Hinton] We are now the lunatic core submit my comment Loading commented Geoffrey Hinton [] We are now the lunatic core original 2016-03-12F assistant Fang Fang UT UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA to its more students to provide convenient public No. he has multiple identities, both computer scientists and cognitive psychologist. Google | Distinctive ResearcherUniversity of Toronto | Distinguished Emeritus Professor He has a sparkling experience. University of Cambridge | Experimental Psychology BA University of Edinburgh | PhD University of Sussex | honorary doctorate from University of Edinburgh | honorary doctorate from University of Sherbrooke | honorary doctorate has worked at University of Sussex, University of California San Diego, University of Cambridge, Carnegie Mellon University, University College London ... and won a number of awards 1998 | become a member of the Royal Society 2001 | first prize in the field of cognitive science David E. Rumelhart Prize2005 | international joint Conference on artificial Intelligence distinguished Research lifetime Achievement Awards 2010 | Herzberg Canada Gold Medal for Science and Engineering2012 | Killam prize in engineering2016 | US engineering community the highest academic body National Academy of Engineering expatriate members "cognitive Psychology", "computer science", "Google" - to hear these key word, you guessed Geoffrey Hinton research area yet? Yes, it is Artificial Intelligence. The focus of his research is the artificial neural network (Artificial Neural Network). Artificial neural network computing model based on artificial neural networks are inspired by biological neural networks born, its operation mode is different from the logic reasoning calculus. Artificial neural network contains a large number of artificial neurons (nodes), each node has a specific output function (activation function). Connections between nodes like memory, association between two nodes is called a weight (weight). Because each network will output node, the node function and weight varies. Neuroscience students must understand it is not difficult to find a correspondence between Artificial Neural Networks and our nervous system. Artificial neural networks are often optimized by a statistical point of learning, which belongs to one of the machine learning method. - Origin - Over fifty years ago, when Hinton was a high school student when his friends told him this description: the human brain as holographic projection, memories are not stored in the brain of a point, and It is dispersed among the interleaving of neurons from the information network. Probably no one would have thought that just such a chat, but it became ignited Hinton entire scientific career fire. The human brain works with enthusiasm, Hinton in Cambridge and Edinburgh universities to complete their studies. The early 1980's, he has been involved in the young initiated by a computer hardware and software to mimic the human brain jihad. In this area, which we call deep learning (deep learning). Depth study depth study is a branch of machine learning, which is characterized by a high degree of data abstraction through a multi-level process, in 2007, under the Geoffrey Hinton and Ruslan Salakhutdinov impetus has been widespread concern. Now deep learning in computer vision, speech recognition, language processing has been excellent application. - Edge - in Hinton began deep learning research, the running speed of the computer is far less than today. Deep learning research tied hardware conditions at the time received only very limited success, so that the scientific community in this area has been marginalized for a full thirty years. AI community to focus on the quest into the human brain similar behavior shortcuts, few scientists like Hinton, like trying to restore the nervous system through a computer. Study Hinton and several other scientists back-propagation algorithm once briefly cause a Neuroscience Network "Renaissance", but interest in it was slowly extinguished. Then until 2004, Hinton published about twenty years back-propagation algorithm, Deep learning still get it deserves attention. Back propagation algorithm (Backpropagation) back-propagation algorithm is an artificial intelligence algorithm to train normally with optimization. Simply put, the purpose of back-propagation algorithm is to find the best match the output and input in a wide range of networks. Unlike simple monolayer of artificial neural systems of different (one input corresponding to one output), multilayer back-propagation algorithm can help the nervous system associated with the input of an abstract concept, which is a linear relationship is differentiation. This algorithm can be described Hinton seeds on artificial intelligence research. - Core - but in this year, Hinton rely on small amounts of money to support Canadian Institute for Advanced Research and other scientists established Neural Computation and Adaptive Perception program. Hinton handpicked members, set up a sophisticated research team composed of scientists, and ultimately change the AI ​​community views on Artificial Neural Network. They studied artificial intelligence network with independent study of nature, without human elements add tags to achieve the learning process, which is called unsupervised learning (unsurpervised learning). A few years later, their achievements starting to get the attention of Internet giants, Google, Baidu, Microsoft, Facebook and so began the development of related products, Deep learning finally became mainstream. "We ceased to be the lunatic fringe We're now the lunatic core.." - Geoffrey Hinton now, I am afraid that few people have not heard about voice recognition and face recognition. When you say the command at the mobile phone, and it's like a living as an assistant to complete the character you want, please do not forget to Geoffrey Hinton and his research partners. - Their Stories - Tang Zhong Xian is known to most people is probably because of this Terrier: his son, his brother, his father and even his mother is his nephew the emperor. Geoffrey Hinton is also a number of family members contribute visible. His great-grandfather was the famous British mathematician and philosopher George Boole, the mathematical logic can be described as a pioneer of today's computer science foundation. Another of his great, great grandfather was a surgeon and author James Hinton. James Hinton's son Charles Howard Hinton was a mathematician main four-dimensional space, it is the author of science fiction Scientific Romance. Geoffrey's father, Howard E. Hinton is a profound entomologist, Howard's cousin Joan Hinton is a nuclear physicist, is unique in several Los Alamos National Laboratory (US "Manhattan Project" in the design of nuclear weapons one female laboratory) work, she later moved to Beijing China and lived a life of farmers. Joan's brother William Hinton is a sociologist, was the author of works related to the Cultural Revolution. ...... You see here Hinton is a screen full of brush dizzy? Xiao Bian here did not even include all celebrities Hinton family, interested students at your own wiki feel its powerful gene. - Broken language -Geoffrey deep learning Hinton Battle hit for decades, people are in a half, is the moment in science. This few decades, numerous talented and hard as he usually coexist AI scientists will continue to develop to a new height. Decades later, when you and I are old time, AI, how will? For future possibilities, we also look forward to tremble. We are now the lunatic core. Chase was crazy, road is hard, but the end is also unknown, but we can not stop, probably this is the power of science to it. title: 老和开讲 | 退欧：世界级分手风波
author: 老和
content: Old and lecturing | retreat Europe: world-class storm broke submit my comment Loading has scribbled old and lecturing | retreat Europe: the world-class original 2016-06-28 old storm broke and assistant UT UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA Students provide more convenience to its public on a number of first history lesson retreat Europe referendum is over four days, but the English themselves do not necessarily understand what the EU is. In the screams, "the British Independent" indignation after the British had to stay Meng turned weak weak to ask, "What is the EU?." . . Say the EU must first briefly talk about the history of the European egg pain. European terrain, even if the territory is not also bred dozens of different ethnic cultures. Our ancestors probably copied it, Europeans believe in "not my race, its heart will be different." Since the Renaissance battle it. In 1618 the first European large-scale war because of Martin Luther's Protestant want to get out in the open church incense other countries in Europe, and other countries to take this opportunity to start playing the "self-defense war." Europe is divided into old and new sects sect overtly fight for the faith, but in reality is a struggle for power sub-site child. First World War ended in 韦斯特法里亚 meeting, while the formation of a European "韦斯特法里亚 system", probably can be counted as the first time the EU. This system, European countries have the right to establish their own state religion as they see fit, so will stop the war. Taierbohe painted about confirmation ceremony 韦斯特法里亚 system collapse in 1648 Westphalia began in 1791, two years after the successful French Revolution. Below, I will introduce you to these core subjects according to their own learning experience. title: 多大明日罢工，四万刀学费去哪了
author: UT助手
content: How to strike tomorrow, and forty thousand knife tuition Where were submitted my message Loading commented how much the strike tomorrow, and forty thousand knife tuition go up 2015-02-27FeanorUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi Students facilitating public number at 16 o'clock on February 26, members of the CUPE3902 before Simcoe Hall demonstrators local Marxist organization fightback in stall selling club bulletin and two guards waited at the front of the school staff on how rumors already about to strike uproar a few weeks, and the date of the strike is the union decided Friday. This afternoon, CUPE3902 some members gathered in the principal's office where much of Simcoe Hall were demonstrations. Organizers of the march in front of Simcoe Hall delivered a speech, the content of the reference to "we should not let someone else pay ancestry financial crisis '' of union members to bear half of how much teaching, how much revenue accounted for only 8% of the annual budget", etc. Wait. "Let those who drove luxury cars, wearing expensive suits gentlemen look, we have hip hop music to help us field." Union invited the band was playing, lyrics intermingled with "Professor at the University of slaves", "managers have like angel Solon. " After the parade along the king's College Circle Line all the way to the Ontario legislature. The main trade union demands include job stability, tuition fees, research funding and class size. CUPE 3902 Unit1 members mainly Teaching Assistant at the University of Toronto, the union will make a similar request to reduce tuition fees and the like is not surprising. Fightback union demands that the obstacle facing the government and the central government that the declining investment in higher education. How also claimed to accept union demands means the Ontario Liberal Party in violation of the Government's net-zeromandate. Net-zero Mandate is public sector funded salary negotiation principles proposed by Governor of Ontario. In simple terms, the government will include university workers, nurses, teachers, LCBO and other public sector workers were wage freeze. If employees who receive any income increase, and that it must come from lifting a means of reducing occupational welfare, pensions, layoffs or the like. February 26 is the last date of negotiations the two sides agreed. It now appears that the strike is inevitable. Parties to view EasyFour published commentaries on current affairs criticism union brazen. TA obtain higher wages will inevitably lead to rising tuition, holding a knife 42 hourly TA are insatiable, how much the quality of teaching undergraduate disappointing. Supporters of union decline in the quality of teaching is considered to be due to the TA are much too heavy teaching load. How much of the course too big proportion of students per class TA are very poor, in addition to the clear surface that TA hours per week wages but also put a lot of extra effort curriculum support. How stingy to hire more TA is the root of the problem. Silhouette circle of friends, "Let the workers have the power! Ah hey" "strike comes rural non-mainstream music background", "TA 220 exam strike also as usual" Editor's graduate students are also human beings, and how much TA fifteen thousand annual salary of less than Canada does poverty line. Limited time because of work, and the TA lot of time and effort must be put into research and unpaid work. In fact, the North American academic community workers working environment indeed continued to deteriorate, to join the academic PhD finally able to get tenure not one in ten. Imagine if graduate earnings environment has not improved, there will be willing to sacrifice precious youth six or seven years to study for a degree? So how should we expect it to continue to progress human knowledge in various fields? CUPE3902 initiated the strike could for most of us is a detrimental and bitter. Think, however, those who are willing to pursue a vast choice of low-income students academic career, and perhaps worthy of a support. title: Pride Week即将到来，准备好狂欢了吗！

content: Pride Week is coming, ready for carnival yet! Submit my comment Loading commented Pride Week is coming, ready for carnival yet! UT UT assistant assistant assistant 2015-06-10UT Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate the public's number is more than students in the end of June, Toronto Pride Week is about to usher in the quarter a year! As 2014 held in Toronto Been to Five in a small series of WorldPride parade, this time it is full of excitement! Toronto as a diverse city, Pride week event, and other large and small, is essential for the annual highlights! To celebrate the LGBT (Lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender) culture, but also to promote gay marriage legal, Pride Week every year to be lively, fun passengers. This year's Pride Week from June 19--6 28th! Let us take a look at this upcoming week, every day, there will be what kind of event! Saturday, June 20 Pride and Prejudice: Our Human Rights Conference (9 am~6pm) Location: University College at the University of Toronto, Room 140 of the conference will start a discussion through a series of case studies and testimonials. The discussions focused on the Pan-American region, from the transgender, transsexual, intersex, gender, and the third and so on transvestites, sex workers or is the community organizer. This conference as we provide a platform to explore homosexual who struggle and victory. Freedom Party (8pm) Pride and Prejudice After the conference, is to support the Rainbow Railroad (anti-gay discrimination and hatred organization) is filled with fun and entertaining night of it! The next day the party American reality show -RuPaul champion's Drag Race (RuPaul's Drag Race) in the third quarter, and "America's Next Top Model" host Tyra Banks, chief make-up artist to help out! June 21 Sunday Sweetness Pride Beach Party Location:! Sugar Beach, 22 Dockside Drive, Toronto beach party! ! There is no very excited about it! In the burning summer sun bath together and feel the sea breeze brings cool. To celebrate the beginning of Pride Week will be held in the grand seaside electronic music parties, will be invited to the king of electronic music Aron, from London Jodie Harsh and Toronto native Jeremy Khamkeo. June 22 Monday Flag Raising Ceremony (12pm ) Location: Toronto City Hall Mayor John Tory in City Hall with everyone Pride Toronto to witness the official launch! You can participate in the 2015 Pride Toronto announced and hear support from politicians, representatives of LGBT and watch the rising color flag! Wednesday, June 24, the famous drag queen Mado swept Toronto! Location: Alliance Francaise Toronto, 24 Spadina Rd at the same time as a cabaret who drag queens, actors and writers, Mado will bring humor wonderful performances! Cabana Pool Party (6 pm-1am) Location: CabanaPool Bar, 11 Polson Street Toronto crazy with the long-awaited arrival of a pool party at the moment! You can not only enjoy the beautiful sunset, but also at the same time feel famous Artist Sollars, Vancouver's hottest DJ's and DJ Delicious Bikini bring music rhythm! Private dressing room, couch and exquisite reception for people, so that we have an unusual Wednesday night! June 26 Saturday Trans Pride March (7 point set, 8:00 parade) Location: North Stage (Church Street at Isabella Street) This is for all transgender, transsexual, gender and third transvestites, etc. etc. the most important annual carnival! You can feel at any time differences and diversity they bring, and their courage and daring cheer! 50 SHADES OF BLU Location: OLG Central StageSydney Blu, a Toronto native is no stranger to electronic musicians will be performing at OLG CentralStage to support gay festival. People of any age can join! June 27 Sunday Dyke March (2pm) Location: Church Street at Bloor Street which is organized by the grassroots held. Toronto lesbians who will be occupying the streets. This activity is not a parade, but it belongs to the demonstrations and welcomes lesbian self-identification to attend. June 28 Monday PrideParade (1pm) parade route: Gay annual highlight of the festival in this up. Xiao Bian now can recall a few years ago, still in high school I came in the summer downtown, to see the homosexual parade style, people cheered loudly, the sound of thunder, the streets are surrounded by a rainbow-colored gay marchers were no It means to highlight their special moment to show their unique color, so I feel that they do their own happy and moved. I believe this also will give you a surprise! title: 【号外】撤资浪潮中的多大
author: UT助手
content: [Extra] wave of divestment of how to submit my comment Loading commented [Extra] wave of divestment 2015-10-31 how serious sexy little bastard UT Helper UT Helper UT assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students convenient public number University of Toronto Students' Union (UTSU) on October 29 Toronto350.org respond to the call, the school started a campaign for the withdrawal of fossil energy-related investment companies demonstrations. At the same time, worldwide on an unprecedented scale grand student movement has slowly begun. First of all, who is Toronto350? The Global Divestment Campaign global fossil fuel divestment movement initiated by 350.org. The name represents the concentration of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, 350 PPM is a standard of human existence, and the current content of more than 390ppm, the name of this campaign is to let everyone know moving target. University of Toronto student how to make a statement? Brief summary, the purpose of the student movement of the University of Toronto requires that the withdrawal of fossil energy companies and investment shares. (The following is the official statement and translations for interested students to read reference) Fossil Fuel Divestment fossil fuel divestment movement The Canadian government and many others around the world recognize global warming of 2˚C as the threshold at which climate change will become dangerous. Decades of scientific research clearly demonstrate acorrelation between carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions into the atmosphere and the Earth's rapidly increasing surface temperature. Fossil fuel burning producesthe majority of carbon dioxide emissions caused by human activity. Currently, global fossil fuel reserves contain 2,795 gigatonnes of carbon dioxide; about five times what can be safely emitted into the atmosphere Governments around the world, including the Government of Canada will limit the risk of global warming climate change is set to 2˚C, beyond this temperature and a predetermined amount of change will sustainable human development. dangerous. In recent years, scientific studies continue to demonstrate that emissions of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere is closely related to the rapid increase in surface temperature. But also difficult to find human activities related to burning fossil fuels is the main source of carbon dioxide emissions. Now, 2.795 trillion of global fossil fuel reserves can emit five times the amount of carbon dioxide in danger. (170 students and stuff of U of T march for fossil fuel divestment) Students, staff and faculty at the University of Toronto have become involved in a global campaign for public institutions to divest from fossil fuels. We have endorsed a campaign led by Toronto 350 , which calls upon the University of Toronto to do the following: University of Toronto students, faculty and staff of public institutions in response to the worldwide fossil fuel divestment movement of the joint. We support and response-related sports Toronto350 and call for the University of Toronto to the following measures:. I Make an immediatestatement of principle expressing the school's intention to divest itsdirect holdings of stock in the 200 fossil-fuel companies from around the worldwith the largest reserves; immediately determined to make the statement, serious attitude about to divest its stake in 200 companies around the world's fossil energy; ii immediately stop makingnew investments in the industry;. to immediately stop its expansion of new industrial investment projects; iii Sell its direct holdingsin the. 200 companies over five years; five years for the sale of all the company's direct holding 200;.. iv sell its stock in Royal Dutch Shell within one year within one year of the sale of the related shares of Royal Dutch Shell. (170 students and stuff of U of T march for fossil fuel divestment) other universities institutions divestment dynamic in 2012, Harvard University Students' Union denounced the school as high as $ 30.7 billion investment in fossil energy, accusing it of promoting accelerated global climate warming, which initiate a referendum and get 72% of the rate of student support. UBC Student Union at the beginning of last year, with 77% voting in favor of the rate reduction of $ 1 billion school-related investment. In early July, the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change UNFCCC officially announced to join the "fossil fuel divestment movement" UNFCCC hopes to support fossil fuel divestment movement, thereby promoting this December's United Nations climate summit summit formed an efficient binding agreement. There are more than 180 cities worldwide, universities, public institutions supported from fossil fuel divestment movement. Discussion and criticism? (The following section is small tortoise personal views do not represent the position of the community) are not the wave of the divestment no precedent to follow. By divestment pressure to reach the ultimate goal of a world-class student movement, we can be traced back to the 1960's apartheid in South Africa divestment movement and the tobacco companies nineties divestment activities. But this time really on fossil energy company's divestment activities whether it can be compared with the previous two? From the perspective of content analysis divestment, contribution of fossil fuels to the development of human civilization has made absolutely positive. The question of apartheid in South Africa, as well as the negative impact of the nineties the tobacco industry has intuitively clear. From this point of view to discuss ways divestments by inciting student groups to put pressure on schools and major organizations to achieve the purpose of money, whether alone? Needless No, the game is not just a bargaining chip between the energy in various countries, but also is the cornerstone of the development of human civilization worldwide. Perhaps you will say, error-free energy, fossil wrong, after all, so many different sources of energy available. How about the truth? In recent years, new energy-related topics constantly, enduring to the exclusive forum, titillate our curiosity and expectations. However, another one a decade later, to explore with disappointments, there is no large-scale promotion may be able to replace fossil fuels and environmental energy appears. Solar energy, tidal energy, wind energy, geothermal energy, and even nuclear power, atomic energy, the energy is not unfamiliar vocabulary all over the streets, become our staple, it is only gossip. Not everyone is regaling casually, then it is possible to change the status quo, to solve problems, but also to heal or contradictions between various interest groups? If regaling may not, whether through the streets in protest, denouncing divestment is both a feasible way out? We are outraged, we are filled with blood, we have the responsibility to protect the planet, we no mistake, no fossil fuels are also wrong? And we need to stand in the perspective of a rational reflection behavior? Whether this is just a worldwide environmental action, or a difficult to reach international compromise, also, or incite students rally unilateral conspiracy? What do you think? Ultimately, the point of the Go Fossil Free campaigns is not just to put money where fossil fuel companies can not use it (they know they are not up to this $ 4.65 trillion challenge). It is to make public declarations that they don 't want to be associated with such industries. --Alice Bell (writer and researcher on science, technology, and the environment) the ultimate goal of "Go fossil Free campaigns" movement is not just the money transferred out of fossil energy companies (knowing this second movement only for the market value of 4.65 trillion US dollars in the energy industry chain breaks against), but to express to the public and related industries to draw the line of determination. This is a sweeping global fossil fuel divestment actions in the end will be what kind of impact the global environment? We'll see. Recalling the common global concern about climate change in the historical process (the following section for interested students to consult and read), "United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change" in May 1992 at United Nations Headquarters in New York by the (United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, UNFCCC) The Convention there is no obligation on the specific needs of individual provisions of the Parties bear, nor provisions of enforcement mechanisms. In this sense, the lack of legally binding convention. However, the Convention provides for mandatory emission limits set in the subsequent dependent Protocol. "Kyoto Protocol to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change" in 1997 in Kyoto, Japan by (the "Kyoto Protocol") greenhouse gas emission reduction as a legal obligation of developed countries. 2007 13th General Assembly of the United Nations COP13 Climate Change (2007 United Nations Climate ChangeConference) held in Bali, Indonesia, more than 180 delegates and observers for intergovernmental and non-governmental organizations of countries participated in the meeting, adopted the Bali Roadmap. The new Protocol COP15 United Nations Climate Change Conference 2009 in Copenhagen, Denmark buddies held due between developed and developing views contradict abortion. "Copenhagen Protocol" is mainly on carbon dioxide emissions from various countries, the signing of the Protocol to reduce carbon dioxide emissions according to each country's GDP. December 8, 2012, held in Qatar COP18 (the 18th United Nations General Assembly on Climate Change) on the Kyoto Protocol in 2012 should be agreed to extend the maturity to 2020. The first since 2022 occurred since the whole car accident. In a fully automatic car driving downtown sudden brake failure, at full speed toward the crowd. Fully automatic car hit the crowd in front of his car and "driver" crashed into a roadside tree, car crash. I do not always want to have a big news like Henry Ford introduced the concern of civilian vehicles in 1908 as the focus of the 21st century all-new car since the product has become a car developers and technology enthusiasts discussion. Since the whole vision of an extremely beautiful car, no human error caused the accident, the nearest petrol ml control, the driver's hands free from the steering wheel. . . If it looks too good a thing, good untrue, then we have to seriously look at it, it would be a potential threat to find out. Death Algorithm (Death calculation program) is fully automatic car against a contradictory voice often instituted. If car trouble just mentioned did occur, it was all from vehicle mode of operation should be how to design? Whether a car should do its utmost to protect its drivers and passengers? Or for the public service, will increase the safety of society as a whole? Answer this question has obviously beyond the capacity designers or politicians, and into the realm of philosophy. Start talking about behavior in life will have to conduct, behavior is a person living in this world is all about. What is human behavior that start with? Is the will. Only if you "want" to do a thing, this thing will be to make it. In other words, just an extension of human behavior will. The role of behavior is the objective world and the subjective world of abstract figurative connected. Behavior and then extended forward is to use the tool when you will want to put a nail embedded in a piece of wood, but there is no hand to knock nails skills, this will be extended to the above tools you use, that is a hammer. In short, all the people around the world to make change, and will come from the instruction itself issued. Some of these commands can be accepted, while others can not, such as theft. Specifically what is acceptable and what is not, is called ethics. In summary, as a further extension of human behavior, the behavior of the whole vehicle from the track can also be used to ethical norms. In other words, we can even put aside the whole vehicle aside from the imagination of the world will become a separate collision. When ethics conclude what will be acceptable, that nature is to be acceptable from the whole vehicle drive mode. From the overall situation to consider "big picture" it is always used to educate people a word, as if that is the absolute truth. But this is not a little feeling of Imperial? In the field of philosophy nothing can be proved that it was not regarded as sacrosanct truth. Bentham, Mill and others in order to prove the overall situation is king, has developed a large faction of ethics, utilitarianism. The basic argument is as follows: 1: the pursuit of utility (happiness is defined as all things) is the ultimate goal of life. 2: The more utilitarian representatives of more happiness. Conclusion: all human behavior must be to maximize the overall utilitarian purpose we take a look at the premise of this argument is established, whether that is in addition to happy life can not find anything else to pursue? After much thought I think this premise is established, because it is "necessarily correct." Necessarily correct definition that is "contrary to it is impossible." We may not be happy to do their own thing? Although it seems possible, but it is not. If a person do not want to do one thing, you certainly can not do it. As mentioned earlier, the behavior is an extension of the will, as too will not think so, the behavior is unlikely to occur. Some would cite counter-examples to say "I do not want to review it, but still you want to copy." "It did not want to review," the negative utilitarian, although is an objective reality, but "do not want" is relative. When you do not want to review with negative utilitarian compared with negative utilitarian hanging branches, you weigh the results would be rolled back to review, as compared with hanging branches, bringing negative review less utilitarian. When this premise is established utilitarianism seem logical to be able to become an author, human society is nothing more than a collective utility maximization as numerous independent utility will pursue a combination, the only pursuit. This logic on our car the whole case from the point of view, the whole self-preservation vehicle drivers killed more people seemingly are the only ethical behavior, because a group of people to live utilitarian than a dead person to be more negative utilitarian . Where there is such a "write-care" thing utilitarian arguments in the premise has been set up, but conclusions can still be knocked down. Utilitarianism to set up must first prove one thing: whether to enhance the collective utilitarian necessarily represent the personal utility upgrade? The answer is no. Utilitarian argument does not require everyone to elevate utilitarian, it requires collective utilitarian improvement. Use a simple example, a physician to kill a man, he gave nine organ transplant patients in need of new organs. For this case, we can use "collective social utility rose" to describe, but do not use "utilitarian society where everyone rose" to describe. (In the literary utilitarianism, learn to learn martial arts will have a look that is as the flu) Why is this issue important? Because the basic utilitarian point of departure, is the largest individual lifelong pursuit of utilitarian, all acts of a person may only for their own utility services. Why change very quickly became a style I want the whole utilitarian social services? Here utilitarianism arbitrary assumptions of the "collective" and "everyone" is one thing. Collective utilitarian utilitarian represent collective, and individual utility logically and not directly linked. Utilitarian conclusion is that this conflict can not coexist. Conclusion Although utilitarianism can be rebutted, but its premise still holds. And this premise itself can give us some answers. If a person's life can only pursue utilitarian, if that proved "we should not be" the question becomes meaningless it? If only one person to do everything possible to have a result that the utility would be enhanced if he had that discussion should choose a different approach make sense? Well, for example, can not someone write articles denouncing the sun immoral. This article can be written in the hype, the sun will prove to be a villain, what is the point? We can not shoot down of the sun. Therefore, as a moral theory had asked to do something fundamentally impossible to do, that it is there would be no meaning. Selfish utilitarianism got this conclusion we have found another solution, that is every man for himself. Everyone do their best to achieve their own utility maximization, that everyone, not just the collective, utilitarian also maximized. This does not mean that everyone will become criminals, because crime is not a lucrative behavior, potential danger beyond its utilitarian. Every man for himself but also to comply with the Basic Law. For example, if I see a person on the street six kidney liked, I still can not take it take it over for himself. Because renal six brought me to jail would be a negative utilitarian utilitarian overshadowed. With this theory point of view the whole case from the car, it will be obtained prior to the opposite conclusion. Every man for himself, on behalf of the whole car as an extension of self-will of the people, must also do everything possible to protect the driver of the car that will. But if the accident, the primary consideration from the whole car only at the expense of others, to protect themselves. Drawbacks and contradictions Prisoner's Dilemma man for himself has been discussed many philosophers, one of the most powerful retort is the "Prisoner's Dilemma" thought experiment. When Prisoner A and B at the same time were arrested and faced with the choice of the following figure. How should he choose? If both "muffled fortune", shut bottles, that they only take one year in prison. If one of the mutiny, and the other does not, it can be freed traitor, a good teammate to take 20 years in prison. Both are pigs as teammates had also defected, and that they both take 5 years in prison. Rebellion is the only rational choice, because mutiny guarantees that he will not take 20 years in prison. Mutiny can never be the best option. This thought experiment proved that a person's rational self-interested choices and can not bring the best results. Which in turn with the premise of the beginning of the conflict. The method is to maximize the benefits of a person not to seek maximum benefits. "Selfish" has become a fundamental paradox. So how to do it? Simply put, not any way. This issue has been discussed for centuries, and no political system to fully comply with certain ethical factions. But since the whole car will soon become a reality today, ethics once again into our field of vision. This article does not want to, once and for all and can not answer any questions, just want you to understand the different ethical factions have different answers. As society groups have the ability to think, we have an obligation to seriously think about these issues. As a whole come to an acceptable answer. title: 【Stephen Cook】He defined a class of “hardest problems”
author: Grace
content: [Stephen Cook] He defined a class of "hardest problems" Submit my comment Loading commented Stephen Cook [] He defined a class of "hardest problems" original 2016-02-09GraceUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public number though much of the quality of teaching has been diluted in recent years, enrollment of the suspects, sometimes while classes will not help Tucao why this teacher can teach to much, but in fact there are still many big deep Gong and Tibetan name (perhaps small series too ignorant) Daniel professor, or else why the rankings every year when they are tyrants standings bit ring yet. As Professor worship series first bomb, I give you about today is honorary professor CS and Math Department's Stephen A. Cook. Scientist Stephen CookStephen Cook is known as one of the computer scientists for outstanding contributions to the theory of computational complexity. [Computational complexity theory] Computational complexity theory (Computational complexity theory) is a branch of theoretical computer science and mathematics, which uses mathematical methods for quantitative consuming calculations required resources analysis and study of various problems in the calculation of the relationship between the degree of complexity and fundamental nature, it is the theoretical basis of the analysis of algorithms. One of the results of computational complexity theory is the most prominent theory of NP-complete (NP-complete). Briefly, NP complete theory refers to a study in the complexity of the class, there may exist a "most difficult or the most complex problems." Stephen Cook in the establishment of the NP complete theory for the study of the relationship between the complexity of the proposed class "complexity reduction" (complexity reduction) is still one of the most commonly used reduction method now. On the basis of the Cook reduction on the other computer scientists have a different model defines some additional complexity reduction, for example, more than a reduction, reduction and random truth table reduction and so on. Popular little explanation, the problem Professor Cook studied computer can not solve any kind of problem. Even if not CS professional students must also understand the study for the development of computer science it has a kind of important. Speaking Professor Cook, it should be his most famous 1971 paper published in The Complexity of Theorem Proving Procedures. This paper is NP complete theory laid the foundation, but also earned him the 1982 Turing Award. [Turing Award] I believe we are not familiar with the name of Turing, yes, the name is the Turing Award from the computer science pioneer, British scientist Alan Mathison Turing. Turing Award originated in 1966, so far a total of 62 winners. Turing Award nominations without any restrictions, but the selection was very strict, only for one (or several collaborators) an achievement reward annually. Turing Award status in the computer industry is very high, is known as the "Nobel Prize of computer science," the major awards. 2013, Professor Cook was awarded the Gerhard Herzberg Canada Gold Medal for Science and Engineering and research funding one million knife. And in this the beginning of 2016, Professor Cook has won two honors: Canadian Association of Computer Science 2016 Lifetime Achievement Award, and international awards "BBVA foundation Frontiers of Knowledge Award in the Information and Communication Techbolodies category". Professor Stephen Cook after he gained his MA and PhD from Harvard University, first as assistant professor at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1970 came after much to teach, it has been 46 years. Not a lecture professor and can not be called a good teacher, very often a formidable scholar is not a powerful teacher. But Stephen Cook academic achievements not only deep, but also teach classes full of praise. Rate My Professor Stephen Cook on everyone evaluation of almost all despite feeling he taught undergraduate courses is one of the most difficult (this year he teaches is CSC463), professor himself was "very approachable and helpful", his class good harvest many. ▲ screenshot from Rate my Professor Stephen Cook, after all, is old and does not know how many years will continue to teach in the book how, after reading this presentation you ever want to go a bit off the election Stephen classes rub bigger God Xianqi yet. title: 多大是如何"击败"耶鲁的？详解USNews世界大学排名
author: UT助手
content: How much is "beat" Yale? Detailed USNews World University Rankings submit my comment Loading commented how much is how to "beat" Yale? Detailed USNews World University Rankings 2015-06-11Ms. FUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's more college students to facilitate public release number USNews World University Rankings for the first time, I believe we have been defeated Yale ranked first in the world how much fourteen refresh the message. But as more college students we seem to get this honor for his alma mater was more confusion rather than pride. We have Tucao, Yale are routed under much, we also struggling to test what GRE. So USNews in the end is how to make such a ranking it? Today, let us work together to explore what happens. The ranking Profiles ranked by the most influential American Ranked agency USNews ( "US News and World Report") launched in October 2014, this is the first time worldwide USNews rankings, according to the contribution of all academic institutions selected the world's top 500. This 500 schools from 49 countries, including the United States 134, Germany 42, Britain 38, China 27, Canada 19. Top twenty schools, a University of Toronto is the only non-British and American universities, and the University of Michigan, University of Washington tied for fourteenth, higher than Yale. Way below the top twenty in the world we have to talk about UT's our big in the end is how is ranked so high in the. The ranking is divided into two steps, the first step is the core of the academic reputation survey by Thomson Reuters (Thomson Reuters' Academic Reputation Survey), the findings of the field by the invited experts are given more specific focus on the academic field level, rather than the broad overall level institutions, academic institutions nearly five years of the contribution of each assessed. The survey made a total of two rates (the proportion of one to one), respectively, for global research reputation and regional research reputation. The significance of the latter measure the contribution of each academic college for a particular area made is first used in the global ranking among the world's top ranking is also in the American Colleges and Universities ranking within the United States is far from the reason one. The results of the survey, and the number of published papers together, were selected from 750 candidates colleges. The second step is the next candidate for these schools score ranking. Score a total of 10 indicators, see below. From the table we can see that the ranking is completely academic rank, and almost all are concerned with the published literature citations. UT strength in numbers, plus the academic environment is indeed regarded as objectively superior performance in these areas naturally good, or even slightly higher than the score of Yale University is not a difficult thing to understand. Specific rules score relates to statistical expertise, greatly accelerates this much to do to repeat (in fact, is not read). The final scores were divided specification range of 0 to 100, the designated top-ranked Harvard University of 10, ranking last in school 0, UT in the score got 76 points (presumably in much the professors eyes set is very nice score of). After the score is simply to get a natural sort, our UT With 76 points, good results, ranked in fourteenth place in the world ...... [applause should be here? ] About the Ratings scientific ranking released, many people feel that this ranking is unscientific, then it is not science in the end it? The answer is yes. Ratings include peer and academic reputation survey two hard targets, it can be said to be an accurate measure of the academic contributions of universities, university as an academic institution, its academic contribution of course is an important part of the qualifications. But why do we see the rankings, will question the emotions it? In fact, this is because the ranking is not the students (particularly undergraduates) as a measure of the situation. U.S. university rankings, admitted the difficulty, graduation rates, student retention, class size, employment rates, student satisfaction and other indicators accounted for a large proportion of the international rankings due to the difference between the various national education system, it is difficult fair these aspects of the assessment. Measure a school good or not there are many different angles, so that the rank and our common sense reason why there were some discrepancies, it is a different angle score result, their credibility is in doubt. Xiaobian whisper for most students, the academic is actually a distant concept. We are more concerned about is life experience in school and after graduation employment. For this ranking, we need to know is the University of Toronto does have a very good academic resources, need to think about is how to integrate this into the environment, or for their own use these resources to lay the foundation for the future, or their knowledge become academic strength. As for the ranking itself, in fact, it is not really meaningful. We hope, at the University of Toronto is concerned about school academic reputation at the same time, be able to more attention to students' learning experience. After all, for a school, the student body is the greatest. Tuition and other fees than rising, while the employment rate was flat, a lot worse than the academic rankings, while demanding their own students often learn a lot of pressure. If these problems can be improved, then surely UT students to see their school will receive the honor when more genuinely proud. However, no direction not run chase, trying to give meaning to the word must be. I do not know the point of this article open if you have had with me a similar confusion: the university to learn what? Learning is good what is the use? I was in turn affect the future? We suspect that they have any significance in the school curriculum, even for their own learning states are confused. He participated b2B industry night, after many conversations with alumni, inspired by a lot of small series, so write it down to share with you. Do not put yourself in the narrow path that many people know, is what profession is not important for most of the job, undergraduate learning. After Xiao Bian exchanges and alumni had also come to the same conclusion. These alumni are some achievements in the business world, but their specialty is varied, economics, statistics, psychology, philosophy, physics, architecture, education ...... when you graduated from college took the workplace, most importantly, what would you rather not what your profession Yes. Wherever you stand, your future has unlimited possibilities. Learn lifesci future to engage in scientific research it? CS future can only learn to write code? of course not. How broad your vision, you have a more broad way. So do not limit yourself to the possibility, not because "it seems to me in the future nothing ah" and refused immediate opportunities. Do not spend time 'wasted' on learning in any field you want to succeed, a very important thing is to never stop learning. Life may never give us what stage now so as to focus on learning how to learn, but why Xiao Bian, because the significance of our school is actually very easy to learn here Fuzzy take time to say "waste" in learning . When the competitive selection, the score is important because it represents your good. So what really matters is not the performance, but the ability to score behind. Every time you summarize, every thought, every analysis, to enhance all aspects of skills, get good grades should only be a by-product of these capabilities. If you learn your energy for a long time are not thinking on the experience to improve the ability, then unfortunately this is actually learning time is largely wasted. Can help you succeed with your life is these abilities, not your back down a point or a knowledge exam score. Find what you love no matter what you do, want to do requires passion, which is commonplace in the chicken soup. The reason I know everything, but you want to find their true love is not so easy. If you do not find this love, try this method. Write down what you like and do not like to do, to think carefully and resistance force behind these things.
